Opening Threat.name: 先声夺人 Opening Threat
Opening Threat.description:
需求 暴徒在他们的回合尚未行动；

效果 暴徒使用交互动作拔出匕首，然后使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。

equipment-Sylvan Wineskin.name: Sylvan Wineskin
equipment-Sylvan Wineskin.description:
A satyr's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside。

With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to eight drafts of wine。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ImgHXPEbN1mPyNTu]{效果: Sylvan Wine}

equipment-Keys to All the Cages in the G.name: Keys to All the Cages in the Glen of Uncommon Wonders

Sylvan Wine.name: Sylvan Wine
Sylvan Wine.description:
Adrivallo's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside。

With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to eight drafts of wine。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.QDs8t1U1IepzYlyi]{效果: Sylvan Wine}

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 Adrivallo is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see

效果 Adrivallo gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack。

Fleet Performer.name: Fleet Performer
Fleet Performer.description: When Adrivallo Plays the Pipes to cast a spell, he can Step or Stride as part of the activity。

Play the Pipes.name: Play the Pipes
Play the Pipes.description:
需求 Adrivallo is holding a musical instrument

效果 The satyr plays a melody on his instrument to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion} without expending the spell slot and using his music in place of providing the spell's component actions. The spell gains the auditory trait and targets all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] instead of its usual targets。

A creature that succeeds at its Will save against any spell cast using this ability is then temporarily immune to spells played from Adrivallo's pipes for 1 minute。

Satyrs are immune to this music。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if Aives rolled Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to him。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: Aives draws a weapon with an Interact action, then Strikes with the weapon he just drew。

Smoke Exhalation.name: Smoke Exhalation
Smoke Exhalation.description:
Aives breathes out a cloud of poisonous smoke that he can make curl around him or cling to his weapons。

Until the cloud dissipates at the start of his next turn, Aives is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}, his Strikes deal an extra [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8 poison伤害}, and targets of his Strikes must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
Aives deals an extra 1d6 precision damage precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Ammut.name: Ammut
Ammut.publicNotes:
These chimeric, desert-dwelling fiends have massive bodies that are part hippopotamus, part large cat, and part crocodile. Though they devour souls for sustenance, ammuts are infamously picky eaters; most will only eat experienced adventurers or, for a special treat, particularly evil creatures, passing over common folk or those whose mettle has never been tested。

Only a few ammuts are known to exist, and most dwell in Osirion. However, recent expeditions into Orv's Vault of the Black Desert have uncovered the existence of ammuts in this region, as well。

equipment-Chief Constable's Badge.name: Chief Constable's Badge
equipment-Chief Constable's Badge.description:
When displayed prominently, this brass badge makes creatures find you more agreeable. You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks。

Activate A Recall Knowledge

频率 每天一次

效果 Attempt a DC 20 check to Recall Knowledge about people of a human ethnicity, a non-human ancestry, or some other type of creature. (The GM determines what your options are.) If you succeed, the badge's bonus increases to +2 for Diplomacy checks with creatures of that group for the rest of the day。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.pAMyEbJzWBoYoGhs]{效果: Chief Constable's Badge}

Shrewd Eye.name: Shrewd Eye
Shrewd Eye.description: Andera treats all Perception checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} as one degree of success better than the result of her check。

Call to Halt.name: Call to Halt
Call to Halt.description:
Andera makes an @Check[type:intimidation] check and compares it to the Will DC of each creature she chooses within 30 feet. Regardless of her result, the targets are temporarily immune for 10 minutes。

大成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 minute and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

成功 The target takes a -10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.pvA97TXnq7wCbXp6]{效果: Call to Halt (Success)}

Angry Vegetation.name: Angry Vegetation
Angry Vegetation.disable: @Check[type:nature|dc:48|name:Calm a Flower|traits:environmental] (master) or @Check[type:performance|dc:48|name:Calm a Flower|traits:environmental] (legendary) to calm a flower, closing it
Angry Vegetation.hazarddescription: Five large flowers in the weed-choked field unfurl, each dusting pollen onto vines that animate into @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.NTXm3ee7WZJ92Sww]{Wemmuths}。
Angry Vegetation.reset: Wemmuths collapse into ordinary vines and the trap resets if the area is left alone for 1 minute。
Angry Vegetation.routine:
(2 actions) If there are fewer wemmuths than open flowers, the flowers create more wemmuths (so there as many wemmuths as open flowers) as their first action。

For their second action, the flowers produce a mindaddling pollen. Each non-plant creature within 30 feet of a flower must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|name:Mindaddling Pollen|traits:emotion,mental,olfactory] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round, on a critical failure). The pollen is an emotion, mental, and olfactory effect。
Angry Vegetation.stealthdetails: @Check[type:perception|dc:42|traits:action:seek] (master) to notice massive buds beneath the other foliage before they open

Ararda.name: Ararda
Ararda.publicNotes:
Before the Black Desert became a barren sandscape, cultures with grand magical traditions lived under its soaring roof. These communities eventually left the vault or died out, but the genies they summoned remained and became warped by the region's pervasive blightburn radiation. Now, these "blightburn genies" have bodies with features mirroring those of beasts that dwell in dark places, and their elemental lineages have been irreparably corrupted。

Shaitans corrupted by the Black Desert's blightburn become scorpion-like arardas. While other earth genies sparkle with the iridescence of gemstones and evoke the power of the earth itself, arardas use their connection to the ground to harness the might of electricity. Arardas are so infused with this radioactive crystal that their mere presence is toxic to most living creatures。

Axiomatic Polymorph Trap.name: Axiomatic Polymorph Trap
Axiomatic Polymorph Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:48|name:Drain the Glyph's Power|traits:magical,trap] (master) to drain the glyph's power harmlessly, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 42) to counteract the glyph
Axiomatic Polymorph Trap.hazarddescription: A Utopian glyph transforms trespassers into aeons。

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: The bitter truth bandit moves in a way that denies its enemies the opportunity to retaliate. When it takes a Stride action to move half its Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions. It can use Mobility when Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if it has the corresponding movement type。

Experienced Ambusher.name: Experienced Ambusher
Experienced Ambusher.description: Striking from concealment doesn't cause the bandit to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed}。

Muscle Striker.name: Muscle Striker
Muscle Striker.description: A target damaged by the bandit's shortbow Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} until the end of the bandit's next turn。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
A bandit deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Aggressive Rush.name: 侵略狂奔 Aggressive Rush
Aggressive Rush.description: 血狼可以移动至多其一半的速度。这种移动不会触发反应。在移动结束时，它尝试进行威吓检定，对5尺内的一个目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。这个威吓检定不会因为血狼语言不通而承受-4环境减值。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 血狼的打击对在其至少两个盟友触及内的生物造成额外[[/r {1d6}]]{1d6伤害}。

Bogey.name: Bogey
Bogey.publicNotes:
A bogey typically hunts a single creature at a time, usually a small child or elderly person, methodically stalking and tormenting their prey. Often hiding under a bed, amid a dark attic space, or in a closet left slightly ajar, the bogey delights in the slow, methodical cultivation of fear in its victims。

Bogeymen are stealers of innocence and devourers of souls. Few targets who survive an encounter with them remain unchanged. Different names are given to bogeymen according to their varying sizes and degrees of power, which typically advance as the monsters consume more souls。

Devour Soul.name: Devour Soul
Devour Soul.description:
需求 The bogey has killed a creature within the last round and is adjacent to the creature

效果 The bogey consumes the creature's soul. The soul is utterly destroyed-nothing short of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or a similar effect can restore it to life, and only after the bogey has been slain. The bogey regains Hit Points equal to double the level of the consumed creature. After devouring three souls within a year, the bogey transforms into a bugaboo。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the bogey。

Bogeyman.name: Bogeyman
Bogeyman.publicNotes:
These nocturnal stalkers tail their chosen quarry for days, even weeks at a time, ominously showing up in back alleys, shadowy street corners, and even in victims' own homes before going in for the kill. For unfathomable reasons, a bogeyman may spare a victim's life and instead kidnap them, absconding to a far-off location before returning years later with a fresh bogey in tow。

Bogeymen are stealers of innocence and devourers of souls. Few targets who survive an encounter with them remain unchanged. Different names are given to bogeymen according to their varying sizes and degrees of power, which typically advance as the monsters consume more souls。

Deepest Fear.name: Deepest Fear
Deepest Fear.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A bogeyman's aura of terror manifests as a shifting haze of images that reflect the viewers' deepest fears. Whenever a creature ends its turn within the aura, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}. A creature's frightened condition (including from striking fear) does not reduce as long as the creature remains in the aura. If the creature succeeds at its saving throw, it becomes temporarily immune to the aura for 24 hours。

Devour Soul.name: Devour Soul
Devour Soul.description:
需求 The bogeyman has killed a creature within the last round and is adjacent to the creature

效果 The bogeyman consumes the creature's soul. The soul is utterly destroyed-nothing short of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or a similar effect can restore it to life, and only after the bogeyman has been slain. The bogeyman regains Hit Points equal to double the level of the consumed creature. Each time the bogeyman consumes 10 souls, it increases its level by 1, and its statistics improve accordingly。

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: When the bogeyman uses a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The bogeyman deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Striking Fear.name: Striking Fear
Striking Fear.description:
If a bogeyman scores a critical hit with a claw Strike, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the bogeyman。

Bone Croupier.name: 白骨荷官 Bone Croupier
Bone Croupier.publicNotes:
对大多数人而言，赌博只是种乐趣和游戏，但对于某些人来说，它可能成为一种坏习惯，甚至是浪费生命的瘾品。而白骨荷官则将“浪费生命”的字面意义发展到了极端。这些赌徒对纸牌和骰子的渴望在生前得不到满足，因此死后它们出没于赌场的阴暗角落，继续寻找下一场能让它们肾上腺素升高的赌局。

对于白骨荷官而言，赌局呈现的是另一种风格；因为自己已然一无所有，这些不死生物它们的注意力转向了其他赌徒，哄骗并怂恿普通的休闲玩家去尝试更高的赌注。在这些受害者意识到之前，他们会求助于几十年交情的老友、把房子用作抵押，希望赢回赌注的一小部分。到那时，白骨荷官已经得到了它们的奖励——对于这些不死老骗子来说，骗人入场所得到的任何收入都是附带的，真正的奖励是鼓动他人失去自己的钱。

白骨荷官常常将自己裹在浓厚的雪茄烟或宽大的长袍下，以此掩盖自己的不死本质，但他们在赌桌上总是恶毒地咧嘴而笑。不过，这笑容不是什么诡计，也不是它们扑克脸的一部分——事实上，白骨荷官打心底里喜欢游戏，不管自己是赢是输，尽管它们有着令人难以置信的骗术和诡计，大部分荷官压根没法掩饰它们恣意的狂喜。

Change of Luck.name: 改变机运 Change of Luck
Change of Luck.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 白骨荷官30尺内的生物尝试使用d20进行检定，但尚未掷骰；

效果 白骨荷官牵动着捆绑万物的幸运之线。 目标不掷骰检定，而是自动失败。

Roll the Bones.name: 命运骨骰 Roll the Bones
Roll the Bones.description: 白骨荷官的目标是邻近一个正在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying}的生物。那个生物可以把它的濒死值增加1，或者掷一个[[/r 1d4]]。在4时，该生物不再濒死，并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}处于0HP。然而，在1、2或3时，该生物会将其濒死值增加该数量。无论如何，该生物在接下来的24小时内都会暂时免疫。

Brughadatch.name: Brughadatch
Brughadatch.publicNotes:
The biggest difference between a gahlepod and a grown brughadatch isn't their humanoid appearance, but the powerful magic they gain as they mature。

Brughadatches are malevolent fey tricksters with distinct stages of life: they spawn from the First World's primal energies as esurient tadpoles, grow into humanoids capable of creating enticing illusions, then finally evolve into huge, slothful toads that warp their environs with mere thoughts。

Bugaboo.name: Bugaboo
Bugaboo.publicNotes:
After devouring enough souls, a bogey transforms into the more powerful and sophisticated bugaboo。

Bogeymen are stealers of innocence and devourers of souls. Few targets who survive an encounter with them remain unchanged. Different names are given to bogeymen according to their varying sizes and degrees of power, which typically advance as the monsters consume more souls。

Devour Soul.name: Devour Soul
Devour Soul.description:
需求 The bugaboo has killed a creature within the last round and is adjacent to the creature

效果 The bugaboo consumes the creature's soul. The soul is utterly destroyed-nothing short of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or a similar effect can restore it to life, and only after the bugaboo has been slain. The bugaboo regains Hit Points equal to double the level of the consumed creature. After devouring six souls within a year, a bugaboo transforms into a bogeyman。

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: When the bugaboo uses a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The bugaboo deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Striking Fear.name: Striking Fear
Striking Fear.description:
If a bugaboo scores a critical hit with a claw Strike, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the bugaboo。

Bugul Noz.name: Bugul Noz
Bugul Noz.publicNotes:
This gangly fey humanoid wanders the overgrown paths of dark, misty forests, voluntarily isolating themself in an attempt to protect others from their hideous form. A bugul noz's appearance is not merely unsightly-to view the being's form is said to tempt death, and backwoods villagers tell tales of wanderers found struck dead after merely glancing at the creature。

As they jaunt through the forest, the bugul noz sings an eerie tune to alert others to their presence and deter these creatures from looking upon them. The bugul noz does not, after all, want to harm anyone; they are inherently kind, if unpredictable, and if they accidentally kill a creature out of panic or confusion, they grieve. A bugul noz who roams the same road long enough compiles a long list of such accidental victims, and they might carry the corpses off to a single mass grave deep in the forest. When not wandering, the bugul noz watches over this grave to ensure that the spirits of their victims are never lonely。

Frightful Presence.name: 气势凶猛 Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光} @Check[type:will|dc:29]

Animals take a -2 circumstance penalty to the Will save。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

Horrid Visage.name: Horrid Visage
Horrid Visage.description: Creatures that see the bugul noz must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] saving throw. On a failure, creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} on a critical failure)。

Mirror Vulnerability.name: Mirror Vulnerability
Mirror Vulnerability.description: Upon seeing its own reflection in a mirror or other reflective surface, the bugul noz must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for [[/r {1d4-1,1}kh #Rounds]]{1d4-1轮} (minimum 1 round). While confused and immobilized, the bugul noz cries and wallows in misery, making it immune to visual and auditory effects for the duration。

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: The bugul noz swings its limbs about wildly. It makes up to three claw Strikes, each against a different creature and each with a -2 circumstance penalty. Its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all the attacks。

Forest Jaunt.name: Forest Jaunt
Forest Jaunt.description: The bugul noz ignores difficult terrain in forests。

Haunting Wail.name: Haunting Wail
Haunting Wail.description:
The bugul noz lets out a hair-raising keen. Other creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31|traits:damaging-effect] save。

The bugul noz can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target takes [[/r {2d10}[sonic]]]{2d10 sonic伤害}。

失败 The target takes [[/r {4d10}[sonic]]]{4d10 sonic伤害} and gains sonic weakness 10 for 1 minute。

大失败 As failure, and the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round。

Buzzing Latch Rune.name: Buzzing Latch Rune
Buzzing Latch Rune.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Disrupt the Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disrupt the rune without triggering it or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (6th level; counteract DC 31) to magically counteract the rune
Buzzing Latch Rune.hazarddescription: An invisible rune on the door begins emitting a very loud buzzing sound, potentially paralyzing an intruder。

Cat Sith.name: Cat Sith
Cat Sith.publicNotes:
Cat siths can easily pass for common black house cats, noteworthy only for the white spots on their chests and their unusually bristly personalities. In actuality, they are cunning fey, fully capable of speech, trickery, and even walking upright on their hind legs and using their forepaws almost as skillfully as hands. Cat siths live around highland towns and cities, regularly venturing unnoticed into nearby communities by posing as domesticated felines or using magic to take humanoid form. While some cat siths gather information and undertake tasks for more powerful fey creatures, others serve only their own mysterious agendas。

Cat siths are harbingers of misfortune and find amusement in the unluckiness that follows in their wake. Though they are rarely malicious, they are fascinated by death in all its forms, and may go so far as to steal the souls of the dying for some inscrutable purpose。

Ill Omen.name: Ill Omen
Ill Omen.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Any creature within the area that can see the cat sith must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become struck by an ill omen. On a failure, the creature becomes immune to fortune effects as long as it remains in the aura and for 1 minute thereafter. On a critical failure, the creature takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws while within the ill omen aura and becomes immune to fortune effects for 1 day。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.zXzXDlh0HkyPJu8f]{效果: Ill Omen}

Cat Sith's Mark.name: Cat Sith's Mark
Cat Sith's Mark.description:
A creature hit by a cat sith's claw must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save or be cursed with misfortune. Whenever the cursed creature rolls a critical success on a skill check or saving throw, it gets a success instead. Each day, a cursed creature can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:10|name:Break Cat Sith's Mark] check to break the curse。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.zTrZozbWDd1A5L5S]{效果: Cat Sith's Mark}

Steal Soul.name: Steal Soul
Steal Soul.description: The cat sith touches a dying creature or a creature that died within the past 3 days. If the target is a dying creature, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save; on a failure, its dying value increases by 1 (or 2 on a critical failure). If the target is dead, it receives no save and its soul is imprisoned in the cat sith's body, becoming freed only if the cat sith is slain. While the soul is imprisoned, the creature can't be brought back to life by any means short of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle}. The cat sith can hold only one soul at a time and can release a soul as a free action。

Catacomb Cave-In.name: 墓穴坍方 Catacomb Cave-In
Catacomb Cave-In.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Prop Up Ceiling] (受训)在坍方前支撑天花板的关键位置。
Catacomb Cave-In.hazarddescription: 天花板不稳定，任何接近倒塌隧道5尺内的中型或大型生物都会触发坍方。

Falling Stones.name: 落石 Falling Stones
Falling Stones.description:
触发 中型或更大的生物接近倒塌隧道5英尺内；

效果 天花板上的巨大石头落下，对触发的生物和10尺内的所有生物造成[[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true]豁免）。

失败的生物也会被埋葬并开始窒息。被埋葬的生物每轮可以尝试进行@Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Escape Falling Stones]检定，如果成功就可以挣脱。其他没有被埋葬的角色可以在这个检定进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助 Aid}。

Caustic Dart Trap.name: Caustic Dart Trap
Caustic Dart Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:32|name:Jam the tube|traits:trap,mechanical,complex] (master) to sufficiently jam the tubes to make the trap unable to attack creatures in a single 5-foot square in the room, or @Check[type:crafting|dc:34|name:Alter a launching mechanism|traits:trap,mechanical,complex] (master) to alter one of the three launching mechanisms。
Caustic Dart Trap.hazarddescription: Three launching mechanisms built into the mudbrick walls expel darts containing acidic chemicals. All three launching mechanisms must be disabled or destroyed to deactivate the trap。
Caustic Dart Trap.reset: The trap deactivates and resets 1 minute after no creatures are in area C7
Caustic Dart Trap.routine: (3 actions) The trap uses each action for a caustic dart Strike. The trap loses 1 action for each launching mechanism that is broken or destroyed。
Caustic Dart Trap.stealthdetails: (expert) or @Check[type:perception|dc:30|traits:action:seek] (expert) to notice the three launching mechanisms built into the wall

Dart Barrage.name: Dart Barrage
Dart Barrage.description:
触发 A creature reaches the midpoint of the hall

效果 The trap makes an acid dart against three different random creatures in the hall. The trap then rolls initiative。

Stench.name: 恶臭 Stench
Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

进入该区域的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]豁免。失败则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，大失败的生物还会使速度承受-5尺状态减值，持续1轮。在此灵光内，生物要从恶心状态中恢复的话，会在豁免中承受-2环境减值。成功通过豁免的生物会临时免疫所有地蜥人的恶臭，持续1分钟。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.uB3CVn3momZO9h0L]{效果: 地蜥人恶臭}

Channel Smite.name: 引导惩击 Channel Smite
Channel Smite.description: 卡夫纳卡什消耗了一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}并试图进行一次近战打击。如果命中，他将该法术的负能量伤害加入他的打击伤害中。如果他没命中，伤害术仍然会被消耗掉。

Profane Gift.name: 亵渎之赐 Profane Gift
Profane Gift.description: 卡夫纳卡什有一个来自芭莱妮的亵渎之赐，使他在攻击骰、技能检定和豁免获得+1状态加值（已经计入他的数据）。

Opportunistic Brawler.name: Opportunistic Brawler
Opportunistic Brawler.description:
触发 A creature hits the bruiser with a melee Strike

效果 The bruiser attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the creature. On a success or a critical success, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. The bruiser can't Stride after a target it successfully Shoves in this way。

Terrifying Sneer.name: Terrifying Sneer
Terrifying Sneer.description:
频率 once per turn

需求 The bruiser must target a creature they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoved} since the end of the bruiser's last turn

效果 The bruiser attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} the target. If the bruiser rolls a success, they get a critical success instead。

Chimpanzee Visitant.name: Chimpanzee Visitant
Chimpanzee Visitant.publicNotes:
Common circus animals viewed as expendable by their caretakers are perhaps the most likely to rise as visitants. Animals that die en masse-such as in a tent fire or other disaster-can even form packs of roving undead。

Although the wild creatures seen at traveling circuses can entertain and amaze, the lives of such animals and beasts are sometimes sad and cruel. Circus owners who mistreat their animals through harsh discipline or overtraining see little wrong with their mercilessness, even going so far as to slaughter their entertainers-supposedly "by accident"-via neglect or abuse. The victims of such cruelty who cannot move onto the afterlife-either because they somehow become infused with negative energy or their spirits cannot rest without first enacting revenge on their assailants-occasionally rise from the dead as visitants。

These undead monsters haunt the sites of their demise and search out the masters who made their lives so hellish with only one goal in mind: vengeance. When they can't locate their particular abuser, or if they are still unable to rest even after confronting their aggressor, visitants seek out similarly evil harmers of animals, becoming torturers of torturers. However, visitants are for the most part unable to distinguish between individual members of a species; thus, if a visitant was abused by a human trainer, any human that crosses its path may become a target of its rage。

A visitant resembles a zombified animal, but it retains a spark of the animal intelligence it had in life, making it all the more dangerous as a result. Visitants' bodies are marred by the horrors of their brutal existences: Their mouths are furrowed in a constant snarl, with a black ichor dripping from their cracked, rotten lips. Whip scars from their hours of "training" glow with an unnatural purple light. And perhaps above all, their eyes mark them as touched by undeath-sunken horribly deep into their skull, leaking blood or other fluid, and glowing with an aura of dread and palpable anger。

Vengeful Presence.name: Vengeful Presence
Vengeful Presence.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that starts its turn within the visitant's aura must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:16] save or be overcome with a thirst for vengeance。

For [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} (1 minute on a critical failure), if the affected creature was attacked within the last round (whether or not the attack hit), the creature must use at least 1 action per round to Strike or use a hostile action toward its last attacker as long as the attacker is still alive. Failure to do so deals the affected creature [[/r {1d6}[mental]]]{1d6心灵伤害}。

Whip Vulnerability.name: Whip Vulnerability
Whip Vulnerability.description: A chimpanzee visitant takes [[/r {5}[slashing]]]{5} additional damage from whips。

Mauler.name: Mauler
Mauler.description: The visitant gains a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against a creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。

Rabies.name: Rabies
Rabies.description:
Visitants can be carriers of diseases, even if they are immune to their effects。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]。

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{Confusion} (1天)

阶段4 死亡

Ciza.name: Ciza
Ciza.publicNotes:
Banshees are the furious, tormented souls of elves bound to the Material Plane by a betrayal that defined the final hours of their lives. Some banshees arise from elves who were slain by trusted friends and allies, or whose loved ones betrayed them on their deathbeds. Others spawn from elves whose treacherous deeds shortly before their deaths left a stain upon their souls. Regardless of their origin, banshees despise the living. This hatred of life is all too often a horrific inversion of their personalities in life. Some speculate that the more kind-hearted the elf (and the more wrenching the betrayal), the crueler the banshee。

Banshees rarely stray far from where they perished and typically haunt thick forests and canopied swamps where little light graces the ground. Many banshees can be found in the elven nation of Kyonin, specifically in Tanglebriar, the sinister domain of the demon Treerazer. Similarly, a large number of banshees can be found lurking about the edges of drow settlements in the Darklands, as plenty of cruelty and betrayal exists in drow culture。

Banshees' mere touch inflicts pain and primal fear, and those exposed to their wails of grief rarely survive the experience。

Convergence Lattice.name: Convergence Lattice
Convergence Lattice.disable:
@Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Obliterate a Key Rune|traits:magical,trap] (master) or @Check[type:religion|dc:35|name:Obliterate a Key Rune|traits:magical,trap] (master) four times to obliterate each of the four key runes。

A @Check[type:thievery|dc:45|name:Stop the Clockwork's Movement|traits:magical,trap] (legendary) check (or breaking the lattice) stops the clockwork's movement and prevents it from resetting, but doesn't stop its current activation。
Convergence Lattice.hazarddescription: A complex clockwork of bright metal and delicately carved gemstones, the lattice's interlocking gears begin to whir as golden runes glow across its surface。
Convergence Lattice.reset: The convergence lattice deactivates and resets after there are no uncontrolled targets within line of sight for 1 minute。
Convergence Lattice.routine:
(3 actions) The convergence lattice uses its first action to call for aid. Each convergent creature within 100 feet of the lattice Strides toward the lattice as a reaction. Creatures thus called continue to move toward the lattice on their turn each round until they are adjacent to it, at which point they defend it with their lives。

The lattice uses its second action to deal [[/r {16d6}[mental]]]{16d6心灵伤害} (@Check[type:will|dc:42|basic:true] save) to a non-convergent creature within 100 feet. This damage is nonlethal; a creature knocked out by this damage doesn't gain the dying condition and is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by the convergence lattice when they awaken。

The lattice uses its third action to make the same attack against a second non-convergent creature within 100 feet; if there isn't such a second creature, it doesn't take its third action。
Convergence Lattice.stealthdetails: (master) to realize the lattice is a complex clockwork before it begins to move; noticing the lattice itself is DC 0。

Gnashing Bite.name: 撕裂啃咬 Gnashing Bite
Gnashing Bite.description:
触发 被腐蚀蜥蜴的啃咬@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}的生物未能通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}检定；

效果 蜥蜴的啃咬对触发生物造成[[/r {1d6}[piercing]+{1d6}[acid]]]{1d6穿刺伤害和1d6酸液伤害}。

Gout of Acid.name: 酸液喷吐 Gout of Acid
Gout of Acid.description:
腐蚀蜥蜴会在@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内吐出一股酸液。这个区域内的每个生物都会受到[[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6酸液伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）。

腐蚀蜥蜴在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用酸液喷吐。

Lurching Charge.name: 颠簸冲锋 Lurching Charge
Lurching Charge.description: 腐蚀蜥蜴进行两次行走，然后进行啃咬打击。如果这只蜥蜴从它的起始位置移动了至少20英尺，它就会在这个攻击骰上获得+2环境加值。

Gray Robes.name: 灰袍 Gray Robes
Gray Robes.description: 普通的服装功能齐全并且剪裁合适，例如农民服装，僧侣长袍或工作服。

Wild Empathy.name: 野性认同 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 腐化祭司可以使用交涉与动物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}，并向它们非常简单的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{提出请求 Requests}。

Roiling Mind.name: 搅动心灵 Roiling Mind
Roiling Mind.description:
触发 腐化祭司成为具有心灵特征或需要意志豁免的效果的目标；

效果 由于恶魔的影响，隐士的思想是一场混乱的风暴。触发效果的创造者会受到[[/r {3d8}[mental]]]{3d8心灵伤害}（@Check[type:will|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）。

Demonic Strength.name: 恶魔力量 Demonic Strength
Demonic Strength.description: 腐化祭司能用他们的三叉戟造成额外[[/r {1d8}]]{1d8伤害}，并且获得夺命d10特征（额外的武器伤害骰和夺命特征都已经包含在腐化祭司的三叉戟攻击中）。

equipment-Gray Robes.name: 灰袍 Gray Robes
equipment-Gray Robes.description: 普通的服装功能齐全并且剪裁合适，例如农民服装，僧侣长袍或工作服。

No Escape.name: 无处可逃 No Escape
No Escape.description:
触发 腐化维护员触及内的敌人试图远离他们；

效果 腐化维护员与触发的敌人保持距离。腐化维护员以他们的速度前进，跟随那个敌人，并在其整个移动过程中保持与对方的距离，直到它停止移动或腐化维护员移动完了全部的速度。

Demonic Strength.name: 恶魔力量 Demonic Strength
Demonic Strength.description: 腐化维护员能用他们的三叉戟造成额外[[/r {1d8}]]{1d8伤害}，并且获得夺命d10特征（额外的武器伤害骰和夺命特征都已经包含在腐化维护员的三叉戟攻击中）。

Tainted Rage.name: 污秽狂暴 Tainted Rage
Tainted Rage.description:
腐化维护员进入狂暴，并获得5点临时生命。狂暴持续1分钟或直到他们失去意识。在狂暴时，腐化维护员用近战武器能造成额外2点伤害，承受AC-1的减值，并且不能使用具有专注特征的行动，除非这些行动也具有狂暴特征。腐化维护员在狂暴时仍然可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{效果: 狂暴}

Counteflora.name: Counteflora
Counteflora.publicNotes:
The counteflora resembles an oversized dandelion with black flowers and sinister patterns on its bracts, which it can contract for additional protection and to turn its flower head into a deadly bashing weapon. Unlike dandelions, countefloras do not have separate flowering and seeding stages, and can release their intoxicating seedpods as long as their bracts are open。

Countefloras exhibit a strange intellect and communicate with one another by releasing invisible pheromones into the air. Alone, a desperate counteflora may ally with another creature if it is offered water or fertile soil. Contrary to popular belief, countefloras absorb sunlight for sustenance; they do not attack other creatures to feast upon them. Rather, the reason countefloras go to such lengths to kill their opponents is to fertilize the surrounding soil and create a nutrient-rich environment for their seedpods。

Frost Susceptibility.name: Frost Susceptibility
Frost Susceptibility.description: Whenever the counteflora takes cold damage, it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed for 1 round。

Tighten Bracts.name: Tighten Bracts
Tighten Bracts.description: The counteflora stiffens the specialized leaves around its flower head, protecting its sensitive seedpods. While its bracts are tightened, a counteflora gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and can use its head Strike and Furious Swing abilities, but it cannot use its Black Seed Cloud ability and it loses its sense of sight (so it must rely on its imprecise tremorsense when targeting other creatures). The counteflora can't use its head Strike of Furious Swing ability unless its bracts are tightened. The counteflora can loosen its bracts as a free action. Against plants and fungi, the seeds burrow into the creatures' flesh rather than infiltrate their lungs。

Black Seed Cloud.name: Black Seed Cloud
Black Seed Cloud.description:
需求 the Counteflora's bracts are not tightened。

The counteflora releases a cloud of black seedpods in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15-foot-radius emanation}. Non-counteflora creatures in the area must succeed at a Fortitude save or breathe in the toxic seeds. (Against plants and fungi, the seeds burrow into the creatures' flesh rather than infiltrate their lungs.)

Counteflora Toxin.name: Counteflora Toxin
Counteflora Toxin.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|traits:inhaled,poison] (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|name:Counteflora Toxin (Plant or Fungi)|traits:contact,poison] for plants and fungi)

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6 poison伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

阶段2 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 poison伤害}, enfeebled 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} (1 round)

Furious Swing.name: Furious Swing
Furious Swing.description:
需求 The counteflora's bracts are tightened

效果 The counteflora makes up to four headbutt Strikes (see Flower Headbutt), each against a different creature within reach。

Crushing Gate Trap.name: Crushing Gate Trap
Crushing Gate Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:42|name:Secure Door in Place|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to secure the doors in place without triggering the trap
Crushing Gate Trap.hazarddescription: A hidden stone rod causes two immense stone doors to fall forward from their gate, crushing anything beneath them. The doors also fall forward if touched。
Crushing Gate Trap.stealthdetails: @Check[type:perception|dc:42|traits:action:seek] (master) to spot the triggering rod beneath the black sand。

Cu Sith.name: Cu Sith
Cu Sith.publicNotes:
Cu siths are hound-like doorkeepers of remote portals to other planes, particularly portals to the untamed realm of the fey, the First World. They are highly territorial and roam the highland moors they call home, constantly on the hunt for any creatures that might intrude on their territory. Those that bargain for safe passage to or from a portal find cu siths to be vigilant escorts that keep travelers safe from extraplanar threats but also ensure their charges don't veer from the most direct path to their destination. Cu siths are highly proficient hunters, and to mortals they offer a single warning in the form of their terrifying bark. Creatures that refuse to flee upon hearing a cu sith's warning bark risk a quick and brutal death。

Cu siths cut imposing figures; they are as large as bulls and covered in intertwining roots, plant matter, and shaggy green and white fur that terminates in a long, plaited tail. Their eyes glow with a fiery green light。

Dooming Bark.name: Dooming Bark
Dooming Bark.description:
Any creature within 200 feet of the cu sith that hears its Dooming Bark must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save。

大成功 The creature is unaffected and immune to Dooming Bark for 24 hours。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}。

If a creature is already frightened when it fails a save against Dooming Bark, its frightened value increases by 1 and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}。

A creature in an area that the cu sith can't easily reach-such as a hidden burrow or enclosed building-increases the degree of success of its saving throw against Dooming Bark by one step。

Worry Prey.name: Worry Prey
Worry Prey.description:
需求 The cu sith has a Large or smaller creature grabbed in its jaws

效果 The cu sith viciously shakes its prey. The cu sith makes a jaws Strike against the grabbed creature with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. If the cu sith hits, it deals jaws damage, maintains its Grab, and attempts an Athletics check to Disarm its target of anything it is holding. On a miss, the cu sith releases the creature。

Daring Danika.name: 达琳·丹妮卡 Daring Danika
Daring Danika.allSaves: 对抗卸武时全豁免+2环境加值

equipment-Lion Tamer's Outfit.name: 驯狮装 Lion Tamer's Outfit
equipment-Lion Tamer's Outfit.description: 普通的服装功能齐全并且剪裁合适，例如农民服装，僧侣长袍或工作服。

w8UngXIC47fcMU5n.name: 对抗卸武时全豁免+2环境加值

Command an Animal.name: 指挥动物 Command an Animal
Command an Animal.description:
你对一只动物发出指令。进行一个自然技能检定对抗动物的意志豁免DC。如果动物对你的态度特别友善，或是它目前的行动动机和你的指示一致，又或是你奖励它以合适的食物，GM可能会考虑调整这个检定DC。

如果动物对你的态度为敌对或不友善，你的技能检定自动失败。如果动物对你的态度为乐于帮助，提升一级你的技能检定结果。特定的专长如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Rq5wkA8DtsmbzoGV]{骑手 Ride}专长可以为你在特定的指挥动物检定上提供加值。。

大多数动物可以进行卧倒、跳跃，搜索，站立，跑动和攻击基本动作。如果动物可以进行其他特定动作，如马可以进行的驰骋动作，你也可以指挥动物执行这些动作——但动物每需要一个动作执行这些行动，你就必须相应的用同等数量的动作进行指挥动物。你也可以使用多个动作指挥动物在它的下一个回合进行数个连贯的行动。比如，你可以使用3个动作指挥动物连续跑动三次，或是跑动两次然后攻击一次。

成功 动物会按照你指令的内容在它的下回合行动。

失败 动物对你没有兴趣或是抵抗，什么都不做。

大失败 动物误解了你的指令。GM决定它会做什么怪事。

Sting of the Lash.name: 鞭笞之刺 Sting of the Lash
Sting of the Lash.description:
丹妮卡以她鞭子所及的范围内的一个仆从生物为目标，刺激它的凶猛。该生物获得5点临时生命。目标在 24小时内暂时对鞭笞之刺免疫。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.6GC248hHu3LdOAtS]{效果: 鞭笞之刺}

Darklands Alchemical Golem.name: Darklands Alchemical Golem
Darklands Alchemical Golem.publicNotes:
This golem is a walking alchemical nightmare capable of inflicting all manner of painful wounds. Its ability to follow orders is granted by the otherwise mindless humanoid brain that floats in its dome-like head. In exceptionally rare cases, the brain used in its creation might retain fragments of memories or even actual intellect, resulting in an alchemical golem with a personality and agenda of its own。

Crafted of base materials and then magically animated into a powerful guardian, the legendary golem is a living construct that mindlessly obeys its creator's commands-often continuing to do so for years or even centuries after its creator's death. There exist two known methods of animating a golem. The traditional method involves harvesting and implanting an elemental soul or essence within the newly crafted host statue, a procedure seen as vile and blasphemous to those who value the sanctity of the soul; evil or amoral golem crafters tend to prefer this method. The other, less disreputable technique involves siphoning pure positive energy into the statue to artificially imitate the creation of a soul. The result does not give the golem a true soul and is generally a more costly and time-consuming method of creation. Regardless of the method used, the resulting golem functions the same. A golem's unique animating force leaves it susceptible to certain forms of magic, but apart from these few weaknesses, it is impervious to magic and difficult to damage with weapons。

Golems work best in play as foes to vanquish rather than allies to accompany player characters on adventures. The process of creating a golem is time-consuming, expensive, and difficult, and only the most talented spellcasters or artisans can even hope to accomplish such an undertaking. While certain magical texts-so-called "golem manuals"-are said to aid golems crafters, for the most part the creation of a golem should be something left in the hands of the Game Master。

Golems have components that can be harvested as trophies or magical components; the value depends on the golem in question. Examples of components that can be harvested from golems are listed in the sidebars。

Alchemical Chambers.name: Alchemical Chambers
Alchemical Chambers.description:
An alchemical golem's body contains six alchemical chambers filled with different substances. When an alchemical golem ability calls upon a randomly determined alchemical effect, roll 1d6 and consult the following:

[[/br {1d6}[Alchemical Effect] #Alchemical Chambers]]{1d6} Alchemical Effect
1

Acid Damage
2 Cold Damage
3 Electricity Damage
4 Fire Damage
5 Poison Damage
6 Sickness: @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Alchemical Sickness|traits:disease] save or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure)

Alchemical Rupture.name: Alchemical Rupture
Alchemical Rupture.description:
When an alchemical golem takes physical damage from a critical hit or is affected by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell, one glass chamber within its body shatters, spewing alchemical liquid in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5-foot emanation}。

Roll on the alchemical chambers list to determine which one shatters-on a roll of 1-5, creatures in the area take [[/r {10d6}]]{10d6伤害} of the appropriate type (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]). On a roll of 6, creatures must instead save against the sickness effect。

[[/br {1d6}[Alchemical Effect] #Alchemical Rupture]]{1d6} Alchemical Effect
1

[[/r {10d6}[acid]]]{10d6酸液伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true|traits:acid]
2 [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true|traits:cold]
3 [[/r {10d6}[electricity]]]{10d6电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true|traits:electricity]
4 [[/r {10d6}[fire]]]{10d6火焰伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true|traits:fire]
5 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true|traits:poison]
6 Sickness: @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Alchemical Sickness|traits:disease] save or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure)

Crystalline Construction.name: Crystalline Construction
Crystalline Construction.description: Crafted in areas where glass is rare, the Darklands alchemical golem instead incorporates crystalline components. The golem's vulnerable to shatter ability functions only for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spells of at least 4th level。

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
harmed by sonic ([[/r {5d8}]]{5d8伤害}, [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} from areas or persistent damage; healed by acid (area [[/r {2d4}[healing]]]{2d4生命值}); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem。

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical。

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical。

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for that round。

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block。

Vulnerable to Shatter.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
Vulnerable to Shatter.description: Casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell on an alchemical golem affects the golem normally, but also causes an alchemical rupture。

Alchemical Injection.name: Alchemical Injection
Alchemical Injection.description:
When an alchemical golem hits a creature with a syringe Strike, roll 1d6 on the alchemical chambers list to determine the additional effect of the attack. The syringe deals an additional [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} of the appropriate type (or exposes the target to the sickness effect, as appropriate)。

[[/br {1d6}[Alchemical Effect] #Alchemical Injection]]{1d6} Alchemical Effect
1

[[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害}
2 [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold伤害}
3 [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6电击伤害}
4 [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}
5 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison伤害}
6 Sickness: @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Alchemical Sickness|traits:disease] save or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure)

Generate Bomb.name: Generate Bomb
Generate Bomb.description:
The golem fills an empty vial from one of its alchemical chambers to create a bomb and then makes a bomb Strike。

Determine the type of bomb created by rolling 1d6 on the alchemical chambers list。

On a roll of 1-4, it creates the corresponding greater alchemical bomb: an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.jC8GmH0Un6vDxdMj]{Acid Flask} from chamber 1, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.intVPcEzbE9o4NQd]{Frost Vial} from chamber 2, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.r2iTRbt1zpkAqHj2]{Bottled Lightning} from chamber 3, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.n5yTlTs63o53n3k6]{Alchemist's Fire} from chamber 4。

On a roll of 5, it creates a poisonous bomb that deals 3d10 poison damage and 3 poison splash damage with no other effects。

On a roll of 6, it creates a sickness bomb, which exposes the target and all creatures in the splash radius to the sickness effect; creatures hit by only the splash receive a +2 circumstance bonus to their Fortitude saves。

[[/br {1d6}[Alchemical Effect] #Generate Bomb]]{1d6} Alchemical Effect
1

Acid Flask: [[/r {1}[acid]]]{1酸液伤害}, [[/r {3d6}[persistent,acid]]]{3d6 persistent酸液伤害}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续酸液伤害} and [[/r {3}[splash,acid]]]{3 acid splash伤害}
2 Frost Vial: [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold伤害}, [[/r {3}[splash,cold]]]{3 cold splash伤害} and -10-foot status penalty to Speeds until end of targets next turn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.nJRoiSyd67eQ1dYj]{效果: Frost Vial (Greater)}
3 Bottled Lightning: [[/r {3d6}[electricity]]]{3d6电击伤害}, [[/r {3}[splash,electricity]]]{3 electricity splash伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until start of targets next turn
4 Alchemist's Fire: [[/r {3d8}[fire]]]{3d8火焰伤害}, [[/r {3}[persistent,fire]]]{3 persistent火焰伤害}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} and [[/r {3}[splash,fire]]]{3 fire splash伤害}
5 Poisonous Bomb: [[/r {3d10}[poison]]]{3d10 poison伤害} and [[/r {3}[splash,poison]]]{3 poison splash伤害}
6 Sickness: @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Alchemical Sickness|traits:disease] save or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure)

Sharp Eyes.name: Sharp Eyes
Sharp Eyes.description: Darricus doesn't need to succeed at a flat check to target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} creatures, and he is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to creatures that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} from him。

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.description: Darricus makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within his melee reach and adjacent to each other. He rolls damage only once and applies it to each creature he hit. This Strike counts as two attacks for calculating his multiple attack penalty。

Deghuun (Child of Mhar).name: Deghuun (Child of Mhar)
Deghuun (Child of Mhar).publicNotes: Mhar, an ancient evil deity of caverns, mountains, and volcanoes, belongs to the pantheon of the Great Old Ones-monstrous beings of alien intellect and unfathomable power. The so-called children of Mhar (known as deghuuns in the chaotic tongues of Mhar's enraptured cultists) physically resemble blue-gray octopods made of stone, mud, and molten iron. Venthole-like craters dot the surface of a deghuun's body, through which the creature can gaze out with a single golden eye that it can move from crater to crater。

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: Delamar isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to creatures of 6th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking, or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.io6eJGrw701WbmYe]{Surprise Attack}。

Nimble Opportunist.name: Nimble Opportunist
Nimble Opportunist.description:
触发 A creature within Delamar's melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of his allies

效果 Delamar makes a Strike against the triggering creature with a -2 penalty to the attack roll. He can't deal sneak attack damage on this Strike. After this Strike, Delamar can Stride without triggering reactions。

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if Delamar rolled Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to him。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: Delamar draws a weapon with an Interact action, then Strikes with the weapon he just drew。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
Delamar deals an extra 2d6 precision damage precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Doblagub.name: Doblagub
Doblagub.publicNotes:
Elder brughadatches command groups of fellow brughadatches, who placate the doblagub with fresh meals and trophies of the group's grisly catches。

Brughadatches are malevolent fey tricksters with distinct stages of life: they spawn from the First World's primal energies as esurient tadpoles, grow into humanoids capable of creating enticing illusions, then finally evolve into huge, slothful toads that warp their environs with mere thoughts。

Dream Pollen Pod.name: 梦幻花粉荚 Dream Pollen Pod
Dream Pollen Pod.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Remove Pollen Pod] (受训)小心移除花粉荚或@Check[type:nature|dc:18|name:Prevent Pod Burst] (受训)以防止花粉荚爆裂。
Dream Pollen Pod.hazarddescription: 篷车内的四种植物在受到干扰时会释放出致幻花粉。
Dream Pollen Pod.reset: 1小时后，当花粉荚重新长出时，陷阱会重置。如果所有的花粉荚都被移走或解除，陷阱就不会重置。
Dream Pollen Pod.routine: (4动作) 陷阱每移除或解除一个花粉荚，就会失去一个动作。陷阱不会受到多重攻击减值。

Pollen Burst.name: 花粉爆发 Pollen Burst
Pollen Burst.description:
触发 篷车门打开或花粉荚受到干扰；

效果 一个花粉荚对相邻的生物或开门的生物进行花粉喷射打击，门从篷车上掉下来，陷阱掷骰先攻。

Hallucinogenic Pollen.name: 致幻花粉 Hallucinogenic Pollen
Hallucinogenic Pollen.description:
被陷阱的花粉喷射击中的生物必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:20]豁免，否则它将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮，并在[[/br 1d4 #hours]]小时内对察觉检定和对心灵效果的豁免受到-2状态减值。在大失败的情况下，这个减值是-4。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.GstmxSP75eKmHtCQ]{效果: 致幻花粉(失败)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.RAKgTTFKc2YEbvrc]{效果: 致幻花粉(大失败)}

Drunken Rage.name: 发酒疯 Drunken Rage
Drunken Rage.description:
需求 醉鬼还没有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}或狂暴；

效果 醉鬼开始狂暴。他们获得4点临时生命，用拳头打击造成1点额外伤害。他们有AC-1减值，并且不能使用具有专注特征的行动，除非这些行动也具有狂暴特征。醉鬼在发酒疯时仍然可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}。狂暴持续1分钟或直到醉鬼@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，以先达成的为准。当发酒疯结束时，醉鬼会感到疲劳，失去他们从狂暴中获得的所有临时生命，并且在1分钟内不能再次狂暴。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{效果: 狂暴}

Improvised Surprise.name: 临时惊喜 Improvised Surprise
Improvised Surprise.description: 醉鬼使用一个交互动作，拿起一个触及内的临时武器，然后用它进行打击。醉鬼在这次攻击中拥有+2环境加值。

Dyzallin Shraen.name: Dyzallin Shraen
Dyzallin Shraen.publicNotes:
When House Shraen was exiled from Zirnakaynin for vile religious practices deemed unsavory even by other drow, Dyzallin Shraen sought a new home with the rest of his clan. Many drow perished along the way, including several of Dyzallin's relatives and rivals. Because the survival of the house was at stake and House Shraen didn't balk at the idea of raising their fallen as undead, many of his rivals returned-often more powerful than before. By the time the exiled drow house discovered the ancient xulgath city that would bear their name, the living among them had become an underprivileged minority。

While Dyzallin was one of the few who had survived the deadly exodus, in the end, he too chose undeath, deeming life detrimental to his quest for power. Leveraging all his connections within his faction, the Sunscar Oath, Dyzallin acquired a set of scrolls detailing a secret method of attaining immortality through mummification atop a specially prepared mirror。

More powerful than ever before, the newly undead Dyzallin swiftly accumulated wealth and influence, rivaling even Zyra and Nyrinda Shraen, the city's leaders. He isn't yet ready to challenge the status quo in Shraen, but he believes his time is near at hand。

Dyzallin has recently focused his attention on the magic orb he learned about in Xul-Khundur. He initially thought the orb was designed to control cave worms; this power alone he might have leveraged into a plot to surprise and eliminate his rivals. But he learned the orb's true purpose, and believes that its life-giving energies might allow him to utterly destroy the undead kin who stand in his way. He has acquired the orb's resonant reflection, and as a curious side effect, his rotten skin is beginning to heal, and he feels more energetic than he has in millennia. Convinced of the orb's power, Dyzallin believes it is only a matter of time before he unlocks its magic and gains control of Shraen。

Dyzallin's Golem.name: Dyzallin's Golem
Dyzallin's Golem.publicNotes: Crafted from a nigh-indestructible metal of great rarity, adamantine golems can't be destroyed except by the most powerful foes. Crafting an adamantine golem requires a quantity of adamantine so massive that collecting it usually requires mounting a mining expedition to a distant planet, the Plane of Earth, or an Outer Plane。

Echoes of Faith.name: Echoes of Faith
Echoes of Faith.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:26|name:Exorcise the spirits|traits:haunt,hazard] (expert) to exorcise the spirits, or @Check[type:deception|dc:28|name:Imitate the Arodenite faith|traits:haunt,hazard] or @Check[type:religion|dc:28] (受训)to imitate the Arodenite faith and render the haunt harmless until it resets
Echoes of Faith.hazarddescription: The restless spirits of clergy who once inhabited this now-defiled temple of Aroden remain within the sanctuary and pulpit。
Echoes of Faith.reset: The spirits return in [[/br 1d8 #Hours]]{1d8小时} as long as any xulgaths remain in Moonstone Hall。

Phantom Sermon.name: Phantom Sermon
Phantom Sermon.description:
触发 A non-Arodenite creature approaches within 5 feet of the lectern

效果 A spectral minister appears before the pulpit, resembling an ever-shifting amalgamation of several past priests. The spectral minister delivers fervent exhortations about faithlessness. Each creature on the dais must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 4}。

Envenomed Thorns Trap.name: 带毒荆棘陷阱 Envenomed Thorns Trap
Envenomed Thorns Trap.hazarddescription: 一根离地4英尺高的绊线会释放出一根布满毒刺的荆棘。

Thorny Branch.name: 荆棘枝 Thorny Branch
Thorny Branch.description:
触发 绊线被触动；

效果 陷阱的毒刺会攻击触动绊线的生物或物体。

Evora Yarket.name: Evora Yarket
Evora Yarket.allSaves: successful Fortitude saves are critical successes instead

Orc Ferocity.name: Orc Ferocity
Orc Ferocity.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 Evora would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed

效果 Evora avoids being knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point, and her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition increases by 1。

Stand Still.name: Stand Still
Stand Still.description:
触发 A creature within Evora's reach uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using

效果 Evora makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If this attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a move action, she disrupts that action。

Successful Fortitude saves are critical.name: Successful Fortitude saves are critical successes instead
Successful Fortitude saves are critical.description: Successful Fortitude saves are critical successes instead

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
效果 Evora makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage and apply resistances and weaknesses only once. She applies her multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally。

As it has the flourish trait, Evora can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn。

Mountain Stance.name: Mountain Stance
Mountain Stance.description:
需求 Evora is unarmored and touching the ground

效果 Evora enters the stance of an implacable mountain until she is knocked out or the encounter ends. She gains a +4 status bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. Her Speed is reduced by 5 feet。

Mountain Stronghold.name: Mountain Stronghold
Mountain Stronghold.description:
需求 Evora is in Mountain Stance

效果 Evora gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of her next turn。

Explosive Furniture Trap.name: Explosive Furniture Trap
Explosive Furniture Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Identify and Cut Wiring|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to identify and harmlessly cut the taut wiring
Explosive Furniture Trap.hazarddescription: Wiring keeping the furniture together unravels, causing the spring-loaded pieces of furniture and wire to shoot outward。

Faceless Butcher.name: Faceless Butcher
Faceless Butcher.publicNotes: The deformed flesh on this humanoid horror's head bears grim holes where their eyes, nose, mouth, and ears should be, and little else. Stories of faceless butchers always center on the monstrous murderer's preferred weapon: a wicked and bloodstained meat cleaver, which the butcher uses to carve flesh from skull to add to their collection of stolen faces. Once they've taken a victim's face, the faceless butcher can wear it, transform into an exact replica of the deceased, and begin stalking their next victim。

Flea Swarm.name: 跳蚤群 Flea Swarm
Flea Swarm.publicNotes:
跳蚤成群结队地在城市街道和乡村腹地翻滚，发出嘶嘶声，刮擦而行，从任何不幸穿过它们路径的生物身上吸血。

在大多数情况下，跳蚤只不过是一种讨厌的家伙，但是当它们长成巨大的比例或聚集成巨大的群落时，就可能是致命的。

Flea Fever.name: 跳蚤热 Flea Fever
Flea Fever.description:
在疾病治愈之前，不能减少或自然恢复跳蚤热的造成的流失。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} ([[/r 1d4]]{1d4小时})

阶段2 流失1和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}和恶心1 (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3}和恶心1 (1天)

阶段5 死亡

Suck Blood.name: 吸血 Suck Blood
Suck Blood.description:
需求 跳蚤群的的上个动作是成群啃咬，而它对至少一个敌人造成了伤害；

效果 跳蚤群会喝下生物的血。每个受伤的受害者会承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，每个受害者使跳蚤群恢复[[/r 3]]{3 HP}。

Swarming Bites.name: 成群啃咬 Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: 每个在跳蚤群空间内的敌人都会受到[[/r {2d4+7}[piercing]]]{2d4+7穿刺伤害}，并且必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]豁免。失败的生物会受到跳蚤热的影响。

Gahlepod.name: Gahlepod
Gahlepod.publicNotes:
The youngest brughadatches resemble overlarge tadpoles about 2 feet long。

Brughadatches are malevolent fey tricksters with distinct stages of life: they spawn from the First World's primal energies as esurient tadpoles, grow into humanoids capable of creating enticing illusions, then finally evolve into huge, slothful toads that warp their environs with mere thoughts。

Ghost Crystal Cloud.name: Ghost Crystal Cloud
Ghost Crystal Cloud.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:26|name:Render the cloud inert|traits:hazard,environmental] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:26|name:Render the cloud inert|traits:hazard,environmental] (expert) to render the crystal cloud inert
Ghost Crystal Cloud.hazarddescription: The xulgath corpse splits open to release a cloud of tiny ectoplasmic crystals which, when they are inhaled, disorient and devitalize living creatures。
Ghost Crystal Cloud.reset: The crystals regrow into a number sufficient to form another dangerous cloud after 1 week。

Ectoplasmic Explosion.name: Ectoplasmic Explosion
Ectoplasmic Explosion.description:
触发 A creature touches or disturbs the corpse containing the growth of crystals

效果 All creatures within 10 feet of the corpse are exposed to the ghost crystal cloud。

Ghost Crystal Cloud.name: Ghost Crystal Cloud
Ghost Crystal Cloud.description:
Creatures with the ethereal trait are immune

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26|traits:environmental,hazard]

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

阶段2 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10 poison伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

阶段3 [[/r {3d10}[poison]]]{3d10 poison伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} (1 round)

Giant Aukashungi.name: Giant Aukashungi
Giant Aukashungi.publicNotes:
The strongest individual in an aukashungi swarm eventually grows to monstrous proportions。

These massive isopods are native to the Abyssal realm of Gluttondark, in the acidic oceans of the realm's many cavern-worlds. Aukashungis are sometimes summoned to the Material Plane by Zevgavizeb-worshipping cultists, who favor aukashungis for their mindless obedience and sheer destructive potential。

Giant Flea.name: 巨跳蚤 Giant Flea
Giant Flea.publicNotes:
巨跳蚤常见于含有强壮巨型动物的地区，例如恐龙或猛犸象。

在大多数情况下，跳蚤只不过是一种讨厌的家伙，但是当它们长成巨大的比例或聚集成巨大的群落时，就可能是致命的。

Flea Fever.name: 跳蚤热 Flea Fever
Flea Fever.description:
在疾病治愈之前，不能减少或自然恢复跳蚤热的造成的流失。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} ([[/r 1d4]]{1d4小时})

阶段2 流失1和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}和恶心1 (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3}和恶心1 (1天)

阶段5 死亡

Suck Blood.name: 吸血 Suck Blood
Suck Blood.description:
需求 巨跳蚤的上个动作是长吻打击命中；

效果 巨跳蚤喝下生物的血。受害者会承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} ，而跳蚤则会恢复[[/r 5]]{5 HP}。

equipment-Bolts coated with shadow essen.name: Bolts coated with shadow essence
equipment-Bolts coated with shadow essen.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows。

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: Ginjana isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, or flanking creatures of 11th level or lower, or by creatures of 11th level or lower using surprise attack。

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When Ginjana rolls a success on a Reflex save, she gets a critical success instead。

Sidestep.name: Sidestep
Sidestep.description:
触发 An attack roll to Strike Ginjana fails or critically fails

效果 Ginjana redirects the attack to a creature of her choice that is adjacent to her and within reach of the triggering attack. The attacker rerolls the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike's} attack roll against the new target。

Vulnerable to Sunlight.name: Vulnerable to Sunlight
Vulnerable to Sunlight.description: Ginjana takes [[/r 20]] damage for every hour she's exposed to sunlight。

Hampering Blow.name: Hampering Blow
Hampering Blow.description: When Ginjana critically succeeds at an attack roll, the target of the attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until the end of Ginjana's next turn。

Light Step.name: Light Step
Light Step.description: When Ginjana @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Strides} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Steps}, she ignores difficult terrain。

Mobility.name: Mobility
Mobility.description: Ginjana's movement doesn't trigger reactions when she @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Strides} to move half her Speed or less。

Shadow Essence.name: Shadow Essence
Shadow Essence.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6 rounds

阶段1 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6负能量伤害} and [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison伤害} (1 round)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6负能量伤害}, [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison伤害}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

阶段3 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6负能量伤害}; [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison伤害}; and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
Ginjana deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, if Ginjana rolls Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to her。

Gluttondark Babau.name: Gluttondark Babau
Gluttondark Babau.publicNotes: The babau is an assassin, a murderer, and a sadist-certainly not unusual traits, yet their penchant for stealth and surprise sets them apart from their kin. Babaus form from mortal souls of lone killers-those who took pleasure in more personal murders, and particularly those with grisly patterns to their killings。

Mercy Vulnerability.name: Mercy Vulnerability
Mercy Vulnerability.description: Babaus revel in the gore of a well-timed attack, and when brutal wounds are restored, they recoil in pain. When a creature heals from damage that the babau dealt on their last turn with Grievous Strike, sneak attack, or a critical hit, the demon takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6心灵伤害}. The babau can take this mental damage only once per round。

Reactive Slime.name: Reactive Slime
Reactive Slime.description:
触发 A creature within the babau's reach successfully hits the babau with a Strike

效果 The babau excretes a gout of acidic, bloodlike slime against the attacker and its weapon. The attacker must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect] save。

大成功 The attacker avoids the reactive slime。

成功 The attacker takes [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6酸液伤害}。

失败 The attacker takes [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害}。

大失败 As failure, except the weapon used to Strike the babau automatically becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} unless the weapon is made of a material that is immune to acid。

Grievous Strike.name: Grievous Strike
Grievous Strike.description: The babau makes an attack with the intent of creating a particularly horrific and gory wound. It make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, the babau deals an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage and the creature struck is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} for 1 round; this @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened} condition cannot be removed by retching。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
A babau deals an additional 1d6 precision damage precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Guardian of the Faithful.name: Guardian of the Faithful
Guardian of the Faithful.publicNotes:
As with any humanoid animated statues of Medium size, giant animated statues are used to guard locations of importance, but their increased size and power make them most useful in large vaults, spacious chambers, or outdoor locations. Animated objects of this strength and size are ideal for tasks and responsibilities usually performed by golems, and more powerful animated objects are thus all but unheard of。

Granted a semblance of life through the use of rituals or other strange magic, animated objects take many forms and serve a variety of uses. A few examples of typical animated objects are listed below. Many of these creatures serve as guardians, surprising unsuspecting adventurers when they suddenly attack. Others serve as idle distractions for the exceptionally rich, simple servants created to handle odd jobs, and the like。

Construct Armor (Hardness 10).name: Construct Armor (Hardness 10)
Construct Armor (Hardness 10).description: Like normal objects, an giant animated statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an giant animated statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 24。

Divine Restoration.name: Divine Restoration
Divine Restoration.description: Each day at dawn, if the guardian has been destroyed, it re‑forms in this room. Its maximum Hit Points are permanently reduced by 10, but it is otherwise restored to its full, lower Hit Point total. Once the statue's maximum Hit Points would be 60 or fewer, it can no longer be restored in this manner and is permanently destroyed。

Brazier.name: Brazier
Brazier.description: The statue carries a wide brazier full of hot coals. To make flaming coal Strikes or use Burn Alive, the statue must have the brazier held in one hand or otherwise have it within reach. Instead of targeting the statue with an attack, a creature can target the brazier directly. The brazier has the same AC and saves as the statue. Dealing 15 cold damage to the brazier or dousing it with at least 2 gallons of water extinguishes the coals. This prevents the statue from using Burn Alive and causes its ranged attacks to no longer deal [[/r {2d8+2}[fire]]]{2d8+2火焰伤害}。

Burn Alive.name: Burn Alive
Burn Alive.description: The statue grinds a creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} into the red-hot coals of its brazier. The target takes [[/r {3d8}[fire]]]{3d8火焰伤害} and [[/r {1d8}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

Guthallath Rockslide.name: Guthallath Rockslide
Guthallath Rockslide.hp: 硬度 10in the guthallath's erosion aura
Guthallath Rockslide.disable: @Check[type:crafting|dc:48|name:Buttress the Rocks|traits:environmental] (legendary) to buttress the collapsing rocks in three different locations. Using large and durable materials (or applicable spells) to support the rocks reduces the check to @Check[type:crafting|dc:45|name:Buttress the Rocks|traits:environmental] (master)。
Guthallath Rockslide.hazarddescription: The rock walls nearby begin to crumble and collapse。
Guthallath Rockslide.reset: The guthallath can reset the hazard with a few days of work stacking the fallen rocks。
Guthallath Rockslide.routine:
(2 actions) On the hazard's first action, any areas of crumbling rocks from a previous round collapse, making a falling rocks Strike against each creature in the area。

On its second action, the hazard crumbles rocks in a 20- foot radius around the previous collapse. A character can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} (DC 40) to determine where the rocks will fall on the following round, but on a critical failure, they incorrectly identify where the rocks will fall。
Guthallath Rockslide.stealthdetails: (master) to notice the odd aging of the stones, seemingly far older and more weathered than the surrounding rocks

Rumbling Rocks.name: Rumbling Rocks
Rumbling Rocks.description:
触发 The guthallath rolls initiative

效果 The rocks of the area begin to crumble. The hazard rolls for initiative。

Early Collapse.name: Early Collapse
Early Collapse.description:
触发 The hazard takes 30 or more damage

效果 Move the hazard's initiative to immediately follow the creature that damaged the hazard。

Hallowed Wheel.name: Hallowed Wheel
Hallowed Wheel.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Flip the switch|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] (master) on the wheel to flip the switch returning it to a harmless carnival game, @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Erase each rune|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] (expert) to erase each rune, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (5th level; counteract DC 28) to counteract each rune。
