Hallowed Wheel.hazarddescription: An ornate wheel, divided into eight segments with a rune painted on each, is mounted on a pole and controlled by a lever that can be triggered manually or a sensor that detects creatures within 30 feet in front of it。
Hallowed Wheel.reset: The trap deactivates and resets if 1 minute passes without any creature moving within range of its sensor。
Hallowed Wheel.routine:
(2 actions) On its initiative, the trap uses its first action to spin, then stops. Roll [[/r 1d8]]{1d8} to determine which segment is topmost when the wheel stops spinning. The wheel uses its second action to replicate the spell listed for that segment (5th level, DC 27, spell attack roll +17). This spell's target is centered on or otherwise includes the nearest creature in the spell's area. This increases the spell's range to 30 feet if necessary. Any spell cast by this trap is occult。

1 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2w4OpAGihn1JSHFD]{Black Tentacles} @Template[type:burst|distance:20|name:Black Tentacles|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,conjuration,occult]{20-foot burst} [[/r 1d20+17]]{Spell Attack vs. Target's Fortitude DC}

2 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness} @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|name:Blindness|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,incapacitation,necromancy,occult]

3 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{Confusion} @Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Confusion|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,emotion,enchantment,mental,occult]

4 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward} Range 30 feet

5 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse} @Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Outcast's Curse|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,curse,enchantment,mental,misfortune,occult] Range 30 feet

6 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} @Template[type:line|distance:30|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,evocation,occult,shadow|width:5]{30-foot line} @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Shadow Blast|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,evocation,occult,shadow] or @Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true|name:Shadow Blast|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,evocation,occult,shadow] [[/r {5d8}[force]]]{5d8 Force伤害}

7 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]{Sound Burst} @Template[type:burst|distance:10|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,evocation,occult,sonic]{10-foot burst} @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|name:Sound Burst|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap,evocation,occult,sonic] [[/r {2d10}[sonic]]]{2d10 Sonic伤害}

8 - @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Spider Climb} Range 30 feet
Hallowed Wheel.stealthdetails: (expert) to detect the magical sensor; noticing the wheel has a DC of 0

Wheel Spin.name: Wheel Spin
Wheel Spin.description:
触发 A creature pulls the lever or enters the sensor's detection area

效果 The wheel begins to spin and rolls initiative。

Harrow Doll.name: Harrow Doll
Harrow Doll.publicNotes: Harrow dolls are unique constructs that can make predictions about the future. The more elite circuses and traveling shows frequently feature a harrow doll, and many use the doll's abilities to learn more about locals to better customize shows to their tastes-or to find easy marks for later cons. Upset patrons that try to harm a harrow doll or reclaim their payment quickly learn that the construct is more than capable of defending itself。

Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: The headless xulgath can sense nearby motion through vibrations and air movement

Powerful Stench.name: Powerful Stench
Powerful Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that enters the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]豁免。失败则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}, and on a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute。

Choke Slam.name: Choke Slam
Choke Slam.description:
频率 once per round

需求 The headless xulgath has a creature grabbed

效果 The headless xulgath slams the creature against a nearby surface. The creature takes [[/r {6d6+6}[bludgeoning]]]{6d6+6钝击伤害} and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|traits:damaging-effect] save。

大成功 The creature is no longer grabbed。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round。

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} for 1 round。

Furious Claws.name: Furious Claws
Furious Claws.description: The headless xulgath makes up to four claws Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks all count toward the headless xulgath's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the headless xulgath makes all its attacks。

Herecite of Zevgavizeb.name: Herecite of Zevgavizeb
Herecite of Zevgavizeb.publicNotes:
Secreted away in the dark corners of unnamed libraries, necromancer's dens, and heretical scriptoriums, obscure texts describe a horrifying ritual that combines sacrifice and suffering to create a powerful undead being known as a herecite. These monsters, stripped of personal will or desire, are born into the service of an evil god whom they worship unerringly and untiringly, often in spite of any opposing religious leanings they may have had in life. Every herecite harbors an unquenchable self-hatred because it was defiled by such a foul resurrection-a rage it turns outward in an attempt to rob others of their faith and lives。

Herecites often outlast the cults that create them. Stranded herecites are drawn to others of their kind, even if they are dedicated to different evil deities, and when brought together they perform rites to magically bind themselves in a group known as a cabal. While cabal members share enhanced magic and defenses, induction into a cabal appears to hold even deeper significance for herecites. The presence of others of their kind with whom they can pray-in verses warped to venerate wicked gods-seems the only solace these tormented beings can find in undeath. Such a fellowship of sorrow is nigh unbreakable, as many an overzealous crusader has discovered far too late。

Customarily found within heavily modified temples to the pantheon of gods they collectively worship, herecites act in service to their creators or as protectors of unholy ground. High priests of different evil gods may even trade herecites among themselves, allowing their minions to form cabals strengthened by their varied faiths. A lone herecite cut off from its creators-often because it is the sole remnant of a destroyed temple or its master has perished-may wander far and wide in search of a cabal to join. Other times, the herecite seeks out a place sacred to the deity it worshipped in life. Whether motivated by a desire for contrition or vengeance, the end result of this baleful pilgrimage is always the desecration of the holy site and the slaughter of its congregants, who may in turn rise as lesser forms of undead。

Cabal.name: Cabal
Cabal.description: Multiple herecites can form a cabal to gain increased magical abilities and defenses. A cabal consists of two to five herecites. The ritual to form a cabal (or to welcome new herecites into an existing cabal) requires 24 hours of worship, prayer, and vile sacrifice, after which point the herecites become magically bound to one another. All herecites in a cabal gain the cleric domain spells granted by each individual herecite's deity, and each herecite's focus pool increases to 3 Focus Points. As long as the cabal exists, herecites in the cabal gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks and fast healing 10. These benefits persist as long as the cabal consists of two or more herecites that remain within 1 mile of one another。

Herecite Deity.name: Herecite Deity
Herecite Deity.description: A herecite is associated with one evil god and is always of the same alignment as that god. Whenever it wields its deity's favored weapon, that weapon gains the unholy rune. The herecite's creators select two domains from their deity; the herecite can cast the domain spells and the advanced domain spells from those domains as cleric focus spells. The herecite can cast the deity's other granted cleric spells as divine innate spells. Most herecites have 2 Focus Points in their focus pool. The herecite presented here is a herecite of Zevgavizeb。

Perverse Prayer.name: Perverse Prayer
Perverse Prayer.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet uses the Sustain a Spell action to sustain a divine spell or the Cast a Spell action to cast a divine spell with a verbal component

效果 The herecite warps the caster's prayers into a sacrilegious echo praising the evils of its own deity. The triggering caster must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:29] saving throw or their spell is disrupted and their action wasted。

Assault the Soul.name: Assault the Soul
Assault the Soul.description:
需求 The herecite is in a cabal of three or more members, two of which are within 60 feet and have used Cabal Communion within the last round

效果 The herecite casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MS60WhVifb45qORJ]{Spiritual Epidemic} (DC 31). Once a herecite has used this ability (whether or not it was successful), the cabal must wait 24 hours before one of its members can use Assault the Soul again。

Cabal Communion.name: Cabal Communion
Cabal Communion.description: With murmurs and chants, the herecite casts its consciousness toward the other members of its cabal. For 1 round, it senses what other members are sensing, knows their thoughts, and knows their exact location。

Curse of Defiled Idols.name: Curse of Defiled Idols
Curse of Defiled Idols.description: Recalling the cruelty of the foul ritual that birthed it, the herecite curses an enemy with a fragment of its blasphemy. The herecite targets one creature within 30 feet, which must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29]豁免。失败则会cursed. As long as the creature is cursed, any art object, symbol, or implement of religious significance in the creature's possession-such as a divine spellcasting focus, holy text, fetish, or rendering of a deity-becomes physically corrupted in a way that debases the deity's tenets (a depiction of Shelyn's songbird, for example, might lose its beautiful plumage to reveal a hideous skeletal form beneath). While these items continue to function normally, the cursed creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupified 2} as long as it possesses an object corrupted in this fashion. The creature can cast off its corrupted objects to remove the stupefied condition, but any new religious objects it takes into its possession become similarly corrupted. The curse can be lifted by a remove curse spell or by an atone ritual. After a creature is targeted with this ability, regardless of whether it was affected, it becomes immune to herecites' Curse of Defiled Idols for 1 day。

Quick Catch.name: Quick Catch
Quick Catch.description: The hooklimb always critically succeeds at checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}。

Powerful Stench.name: Powerful Stench
Powerful Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that enters the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]豁免。失败则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}, and on a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute。

Raking Claws.name: Raking Claws
Raking Claws.description: The hooklimb flexes hooklike barbs on its claws. Until the start of the hooklimb's next turn, its claws @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} deal an additional @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d10.success]。

equipment-Gray Robes.name: 灰袍 Gray Robes
equipment-Gray Robes.description: 普通的服装功能齐全并且剪裁合适，例如农民服装，僧侣长袍或工作服。

No Escape.name: 无处可逃 No Escape
No Escape.description:
触发 腐化维护员触及内的敌人试图远离他们；

效果 腐化维护员与触发的敌人保持距离。腐化维护员以他们的速度前进，跟随那个敌人，并在其整个移动过程中保持与对方的距离，直到它停止移动或腐化维护员移动完了全部的速度。

Demonic Strength.name: 恶魔力量 Demonic Strength
Demonic Strength.description: 腐化维护员能用他们的三叉戟造成额外[[/r {1d8}]]{1d8伤害}，并且获得夺命d10特征（额外的武器伤害骰和夺命特征都已经包含在腐化维护员的三叉戟攻击中）。

Tainted Rage.name: 污秽狂暴 Tainted Rage
Tainted Rage.description:
腐化维护员进入狂暴，并获得5点临时生命。狂暴持续1分钟或直到他们失去意识。在狂暴时，腐化维护员用近战武器能造成额外2点伤害，承受AC-1的减值，并且不能使用具有专注特征的行动，除非这些行动也具有狂暴特征。腐化维护员在狂暴时仍然可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{效果: 狂暴}

Host of Spirits.name: Host of Spirits
Host of Spirits.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:43|name:Exorcise Spirits] (master) to exorcise the spirits or @Check[type:deception|dc:45|name:Trick the Spirits] (master) to trick the spirits into departing
Host of Spirits.hazarddescription: A host of angry spirits inhabiting the ruined house attempts to drag living creatures closer and crush them to death。
Host of Spirits.reset: The haunt ends 1 round after no creatures are within 50 feet of the house. The haunt resets after 1 day。
Host of Spirits.routine: t For each of its actions, the trap attempts a ghostly hand Strike against a different creature within 50 feet of the ruins of the house (if there are fewer than 3 creatures, the haunt doesn't use its remaining actions)。

Iffdahsil.name: Iffdahsil
Iffdahsil.publicNotes: The slithering horror known as Iffdahsil is an undead shoggoth that has haunted the vault of the Black Desert for millennia. Drow legends in particular tend to feature Iffdahsil, terrifying the elves from a young age。

Imperious Darkside Mirror.name: Imperious Darkside Mirror
Imperious Darkside Mirror.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:42|name:Retrieve a Creture from the Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to retrieve a creature from the mirror within 10 minutes of the switch (possible only if their mirror duplicate is dead), @Check[type:thievery|dc:47|name:Permanently Disable the Mirror|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to permanently disable the mirror once all mirror duplicates are dead, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 40) to counteract the mirror for 1 minute and prevent additional replacements from appearing during that time。
Imperious Darkside Mirror.hazarddescription:
This magic mirror replaces characters with evil duplicates from another dimension。

The mirror can't be damaged while any mirror duplicate is alive。
Imperious Darkside Mirror.reset: The mirror is always ready to absorb creatures into another dimension. 10 minutes after a creature is sucked into the mirror, if an ally doesn't rescue the creature using the Thievery skill, the creature reaches the mirror dimension, where it could be captured or killed. In the mirror dimension, it counts as a mirror duplicate, so the denizens of the other dimension can't destroy the mirror on their side while the absorbed creature is there. These dimensions are alternate realities, not planes, so even rituals like plane shift can't reach them。
Imperious Darkside Mirror.routine:
(1 action) The mirror absorbs another reflected creature into the mirror (DC 42 Reflex) and replaces it with a mirror duplicate. Mirror duplicates act on their own initiative, using the same statistics as the original creature, but with an evil alignment (changing only abilities that shift with the alignment change)。

Mirror duplicates are legendary in Intimidation and are permanently quickened, but they can use this additional action only to Demoralize。

A mirror duplicate can spend 3 actions in contact with the mirror to return to its original dimension and release the creature it duplicated, but most mirror duplicates prefer not to。
Imperious Darkside Mirror.stealthdetails: +32 (Legendary) to notice that the mirror isn't a regular mirror。

Iridescent Elephant.name: Iridescent Elephant
Iridescent Elephant.publicNotes: An iridescent animal is a wild or domesticated animal that has undergone a magical transformation to become a luminescent beast that can glow in the dark and use dazzling light-based powers. Although the effect is glamorous, the life of an iridescent animal is a sad one. The change drastically weakens the animal, diminishing both its strength and its vitality. This effect is desirable for some-particularly the circuses, menageries, and royal courts that typically purchase these glowing beasts-but never for the animal itself. Because the effects of the transformation are so deleterious, the act of creating an iridescent animal is strongly frowned upon by druids and other naturalists, some of whom dedicate their lives to rescuing and fostering these maltreated creatures. The procedure cannot be reversed, and few iridescent animals are fit to live in the wild after the transformation, cementing their lot in life to serve as showy beasts of burden or objects of entertainment and ridicule。

Glowing Bones.name: Glowing Bones
Glowing Bones.description: An iridescent animal emits phosphorescent bright light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}. The animal can suppress this display until the end of its next turn as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The color of the light is determined by the iridescent animal's creator。

Color Splash.name: Color Splash
Color Splash.description: When the iridescent elephant stomps its foot, a bright, disorienting burst of light pulses through its leg. Each creatures adjacent to the iridescent elephant when it makes a foot Strike (regardless of whether or not it hit) must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until the beginning of the elephant's next turn。

Trunk Beam.name: Trunk Beam
Trunk Beam.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The iridescent elephant blasts a beam of light from its trunk in a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save。

大成功 The creature is unaffected。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 minute。

大失败 The creature is blinded permanently。

Grabbing Trunk.name: Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the elephant's trunk is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}. If the elephant moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it。

equipment-Pot of Grease Paint.name: 油彩罐 Pot of Grease Paint

Bob and Weave.name: 弹韧摆渡 Bob and Weave
Bob and Weave.description:
触发 杰利科是他可见的攻击者的打击目标；

效果 杰利科在对抗触发的打击时的AC上获得+2环境加值。

Bounce.name: 弹跳 Bounce
Bounce.description: 杰利科@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}。

Bounce-Bounce.name: 弹弹跃 Bounce-Bounce
Bounce-Bounce.description: 杰利科以他的速度行走，并且在此动作中不会触发反应动作。

Juggler.name: 杂耍 Juggler
Juggler.description: 如果杰利科的保龄球瓶远程打击命中，保龄球瓶会从目标上弹回杰利科身上。如果杰利科有空闲的手，他可以再次抓住它。

Boar Charge.name: 猪突 Boar Charge
Boar Charge.description: 幼年野猪可以最多行走两次，然后使出獠牙打击。只要它移动了至少20尺，它的攻击骰就会获得+2环境加值。

Kalkek.name: Kalkek
Kalkek.publicNotes:
Once a barghest has eaten enough to grow into a greater barghest, it typically seeks a method to leave the Material Plane and return to the Abyss, there joining other fiends as yet another of that plane's horrors. As barghests have no innate ability to travel the planes, though, the time it takes for most greater barghests to engineer such a return can usually be measured in years, if not decades. During that time, greater barghests continue to play the roles of gluttons, hunters of humanity, and tyrants of goblinoid tribes. More than a few grow accustomed to such lives on the Material Plane and wholly abandon the end goal of returning to the Abyss, despite the fact that those who do make such a return home often grow even more powerful over time, gaining eerie new abilities and qualities absorbed from the raw chaos of the Abyss itself。

In addition to greater barghests being more powerful than typical barghests, the process of transforming into a greater barghest results in hideous mutations that often grant deadly abilities. Some barghests grow large bat-like wings upon their transformation. Others develop toxic breath or vestigial limbs. The options detailed in the stats below represent only the tip of the proverbial iceberg for barghest mutations-feel free to use these as inspiration for coming up with new mutations of your own design。

Wolf Empathy.name: Wolf Empathy
Wolf Empathy.description: Kalkek can communicate with lupines and gains a +2 circumstance bonus on Intimidation checks against lupines。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The barghest takes on the shape of a goblinoid (a goblin, hobgoblin, or bugbear) or a wolf, or it transforms back into its true form. When the barghest is a goblinoid, it loses its jaws and claw Strikes, it becomes Small if it is a goblin, and its Speed changes to 20 feet. When the barghest is a wolf, its Speed changes to 40 feet and its jaws gain Knockdown. Each individual barghest has only one goblinoid form and one wolf form。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Mutations.name: Mutations
Mutations.description:
The process of consuming corpses to evolve into a greater barghest results in odd and unpredictable physiological changes. Kalkek has two minor mutations,

Large Grin Gives a powerful, tearing bite。

Wolf Empathy Kalkek has an uncanny empathy with wolves。

Krooth Summoning Rune.name: Krooth Summoning Rune
Krooth Summoning Rune.disable: @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:24|name:Approach without triggering the trap|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] to approach without triggering the trap followed by @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Erase the rune|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] (expert) to erase the rune, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (4th level; counteract DC 24) to counteract the rune。
Krooth Summoning Rune.hazarddescription: The haze conceals a rune that summons a krooth in front of the door to area B10。

Summon Monster.name: Summon Monster
Summon Monster.description:
触发 A non‑xulgath, non‑demon creature that isn't carrying a religious symbol of Zevgavizeb crosses from the north part of the hall to the south part of the hall

效果 The trap summons a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.WNqPRMjKW0oCHZ8X]{Krooth}. The krooth rolls initiative and remains for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮}, after which the spell ends and the krooth disappears. The krooth also disappears if someone disables the trap before the duration expires. Unlike most summoned creatures, the krooth can use 3 actions each round and can use reactions。

Lakkai One-Fang.name: 「独牙」拉凯 Lakkai One-Fang
Lakkai One-Fang.publicNotes:
地蜥人头领通常为社区内最强大、暴力的成员——不过在某些情况下，特别是较大的群体中，地蜥人很可能是被强大的恶魔信徒或其他怪物所领导，他们将地蜥人作为仆人或奴隶来使役。

这些形似爬行类的类人生物生活在幽暗地域的最顶层，地蜥人（许多地表居民会将他们称为战蜥人）会在入侵者踏入他们的势力范围时立刻发动攻击。他们生活在简单的家族式社区中，为了生存而与幽暗地域的其他敌对群体和好斗居民战斗。地蜥人偶尔会袭击地表的居民点，这种行为通常是在残忍、嗜血的首领的命令下发生，而这些首领自身又通常被更为强大的生物所奴役，比如娜迦或恶魔。一名典型的地蜥人通常会有灰色、暗灰色或灰白的鳞片，长长的尾巴以及顺着整个脊柱的骨质突起物。地蜥人一般有5尺高，150磅重。

尽管现在的地蜥人十分野蛮且分散在各处，但他们曾是主物质世界中最早崛起的智能类人生物之一，统治着疆域遍及幽暗地域的庞大帝国。时至今日，能够保存至这个时代的只剩下某些较大洞穴中的石质金字塔废墟和破碎城市。一部分地蜥人仍旧生活在这些废墟中，崇拜着祖先的成就；有一部分地蜥人将这些地区视为禁地，任由幽暗地域的虫豸们肆虐其中。智者们无法就古地蜥人文明衰落的原因得出统一的结论。有些人认为这是与蛇人长年战争的败果，而有的人则认为是恶魔崇拜从内部腐蚀了这个文明。

当然，许多地蜥人聚居地在今天仍旧信奉恶魔，他们向这些来自深渊的可怖生物效忠并献上活祭。地蜥人萨满偶尔会呼唤并束缚次级恶魔来帮助群体，但过于深入研究神秘学的萨满很可能会召唤出太过强大的魔族，使得地蜥人部族反遭奴役或被直接毁灭。

Stench.name: 恶臭 Stench
Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

进入该区域的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]豁免。失败则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，大失败的生物还会使速度承受-5尺状态减值，持续1轮。在此灵光内，生物要从恶心状态中恢复的话，会在豁免中承受-2环境减值。成功通过豁免的生物会临时免疫所有地蜥人的恶臭，持续1分钟。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.uB3CVn3momZO9h0L]{效果: 地蜥人恶臭}

Weakening Strike.name: 削弱打击 Weakening Strike
Weakening Strike.description: 目标必须成功进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]豁免，失败则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，重击为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1轮。

Minion.name: 挥砍 Minion
Minion.description: 如果丹妮卡使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal}动作，莱安德鲁斯在她的回合中可以使用2个动作。否则，他只能使用一个动作，他可以用这个动作来行走或打击。

Stalker.name: 潜伏者 Stalker
Stalker.description: 莱安德鲁斯对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}的目标造成额外[[/r {1d4}[precision]]]{1d4精准伤害}。

Lion Visitant.name: Lion Visitant
Lion Visitant.publicNotes:
Scars and other marks of obvious mistreatment are the clearest indicators that an undead animal is no mere zombie。

Although the wild creatures seen at traveling circuses can entertain and amaze, the lives of such animals and beasts are sometimes sad and cruel. Circus owners who mistreat their animals through harsh discipline or overtraining see little wrong with their mercilessness, even going so far as to slaughter their entertainers-supposedly "by accident"-via neglect or abuse. The victims of such cruelty who cannot move onto the afterlife-either because they somehow become infused with negative energy or their spirits cannot rest without first enacting revenge on their assailants-occasionally rise from the dead as visitants。

These undead monsters haunt the sites of their demise and search out the masters who made their lives so hellish with only one goal in mind: vengeance. When they can't locate their particular abuser, or if they are still unable to rest even after confronting their aggressor, visitants seek out similarly evil harmers of animals, becoming torturers of torturers. However, visitants are for the most part unable to distinguish between individual members of a species; thus, if a visitant was abused by a human trainer, any human that crosses its path may become a target of its rage。

A visitant resembles a zombified animal, but it retains a spark of the animal intelligence it had in life, making it all the more dangerous as a result. Visitants' bodies are marred by the horrors of their brutal existences: Their mouths are furrowed in a constant snarl, with a black ichor dripping from their cracked, rotten lips. Whip scars from their hours of "training" glow with an unnatural purple light. And perhaps above all, their eyes mark them as touched by undeath-sunken horribly deep into their skull, leaking blood or other fluid, and glowing with an aura of dread and palpable anger。

Whip Vulnerability.name: Whip Vulnerability
Whip Vulnerability.description: A lion visitant takes [[/r {7}[slashing]]]{7} additional damage from whips。

Pack Attack.name: Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: The visitant deals an extra [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害} to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the visitant's allies。

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: The visitant Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the visitant began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the ability's Strike。

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
The visitant lets out a loud and horrifying roar. Each creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100尺} must attempt at a @Check[type:will|dc:19] save。

No matter the result, affected creatures are then temporarily immune to the effect for 1 minute。

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables.

大成功 The creature is unaffected。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The visitant deals an extra [[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8精准伤害} to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Luminous Ooze.name: 发光泥怪 Luminous Ooze
Luminous Ooze.publicNotes:
发光泥怪是一种奇怪的球状生物，会发出耀眼的多色光。与许多依靠伪装和隐身来攻击猎物的泥怪不同，发光泥怪以其令人印象深刻的光线显示来吸引受害者，然后使他们失明并发起狂热的攻击。它们经常出现在黑暗洞穴的天花板或墙壁上，有许多好奇的探险者仅仅因为研究它们奇怪而美丽的光线而遭到了灭顶之灾。电击对发光泥怪的影响尚不清楚，不过那些研究过这些生物的人把它们吸收电击的能力比作避雷针。

这些生物受到渴望地位的社会名流、张扬的酒吧老板和大胆的节目主持人的追捧，因为除了是危险的怪物之外，发光泥怪也是美丽的棱形光的不可思议的来源，能够与魔法的灯光秀相媲美，但价格却很便宜。当然，诀窍在于捕捉和圈养这样的标本。最可靠的方法是用一堵永久力场墙将发光泥怪塑造成一个立方体或球体，但很少有人有能力创造或委托他人创造这样的围墙。只是，大多数人拥有发光泥怪时，只是把它放在一个厚厚的玻璃盒子里。只要它们吃得好，发光泥怪就会接受这种待遇，不过如果饥饿的发光泥怪从展示柜里逃出来，附近的人就有危险了。

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 发光泥怪可以通过振动和空气运动感知附近的运动。

Bedazzling.name: 刺目光线 Bedazzling
Bedazzling.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

发光泥怪不断散发出令人分心的多色光。在灵光范围内结束其回合的生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]豁免，否则就会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}，直到其下一回合结束。如果大失败，它将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}，直到下一回合结束。

Lightning Catcher.name: 捕电者 Lightning Catcher
Lightning Catcher.description: 每当发光泥怪的免疫电击阻止它受到伤害时，它就会获得8点临时HP。直到它的下一回合结束，发光泥怪的伪足攻击会造成额外[[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6点电击伤害}。

Light Up.name: 发出强光 Light Up
Light Up.description:
泥怪发出耀眼的光芒。所有@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的生物都必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}直至其下一回合结束。

失败 该生物被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}直到其下一回合结束。

Masks of Aroden's Guises.name: Masks of Aroden's Guises
Masks of Aroden's Guises.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:29|name:Dismiss the magic|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] (expert) or @Check[type:occultism|dc:29|name:Dismiss the magic|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] or @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Dismiss the magic|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] (expert) to dismiss the magic on a single statue. Replacing the two missing masks (a mask made of or incorporating coins on the merchant statue and a mask made of any valuable fabric on the tailor statue) and succeeding at a @Check[type:religion|dc:27|name:Disarm the trap|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap] check disarms the trap。
Masks of Aroden's Guises.reset: The trap deactivates and resets 1 minute after it has no target creatures
Masks of Aroden's Guises.routine: (3 actions) An unmasked statue casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} (@Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap,death,emotion,fear,illusion,mental] and @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:hazard,complex,magical,trap,death,emotion,fear,illusion,mental,incapacitation]) against a target in the room for each of the trap's actions, creating an image of the statue lunging forth. It doesn't affect the same creature more than once; if there are fewer targets than it has actions, the trap doesn't use its remaining actions. Unmasking an additional statue increases the hazard's actions by 1, and replacing a mask reduces its actions by 1。

Unmasked Statues.name: Unmasked Statues
Unmasked Statues.description:
触发 A creature removes the mask from a statue

效果 The trap casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} (DC 27) against the creature, creating an image of the statue lunging forth. The trap then rolls initiative。

Maze of Mirrors.name: Maze of Mirrors
Maze of Mirrors.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Stop the mirrors|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] (expert) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (5th level; counteract DC 28) to stop the mirrors' shuffling; @Check[type:occultism|dc:28|name:Dispel the minotaur|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] or @Check[type:religion|dc:28|name:Dispel the minotaur|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] (expert) to dispel the minotaur
Maze of Mirrors.hazarddescription: Invisible runes in the maze disorient those within it and cause its mirrored walls to shift about。
Maze of Mirrors.reset: The trap deactivates and resets if 1 minute passes without any creature in the maze。
Maze of Mirrors.routine:
(3 actions) The trap uses its first action to magically shuffle the mirrors, rendering markings or maps of the maze ineffective. Creatures in the maze that fail a @Check[type:will|dc:26|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until they leave the maze. If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4})。

For its second action, the trap's ghostly minotaur attacks a random creature in the maze with its spectral gore。

For its third action, the trap makes another spectral gore attack against a random creature。
Maze of Mirrors.stealthdetails: (受训)to detect the magical runes in the maze; noticing the maze itself has a DC of 0

The Maze Awakens.name: The Maze Awakens
The Maze Awakens.description:
触发 A creature enters the maze

效果 Creatures in the maze can't escape it except by use of teleportation magic or as described in Trapped in the Maze. The trap rolls initiative。

Trapped in the Maze.name: Trapped in the Maze
Trapped in the Maze.description:
Once each turn after it has taken a move action within the maze, each target in the maze can spend 1 action to attempt a @Check[type:perception|dc:26|name:Escape the Maze|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] or @Check[type:survival|dc:26|name:Escape the Maze|traits:hazard,complex,magical,mechanical,trap] check to escape it. A group traveling the maze together is treated as a single target; no more than one creature in the group can attempt this check each round, but accompanying creatures can Aid this check. The possible outcomes follow. A target attempting to leave the maze the same way it entered uses the outcome for one degree of success better than the result of its roll when attempting this check (failure to success, for example)。

大成功 The target escapes the maze。

成功 The target is on the right path to the exit. If the target was already on the right path, it escapes the maze。

失败 The target makes no progress toward escape。

大失败 The target makes no progress toward escape, and if it was on the right path, it no longer is。

Mechanical Carny.name: 嘉年华机器人 Mechanical Carny
Mechanical Carny.publicNotes: 嘉年华机器人是为了在嘉年华会和马戏团充当艺人、清洁工和守卫而制造的。第一个构装体是由一个侏儒发明家创造的，她渴望有一个不知疲倦的伙伴，可以让她欢笑和微笑。她的发明是如此成功，以至于在整个内海产生了无数的模仿和山寨产品，某种形式的嘉年华机器人是阿维斯坦和迦伦德的大都市上的主力。

Haywire.name: 发生故障 Haywire
Haywire.description:
一个严重损坏的嘉年华机器人有可能会发生故障。如果嘉年华机器人在它的回合开始时生命值15或更低，它必须通过@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则就会失控。失控的嘉年华机器人会疯狂地攻击最近的生物，如果附近没有生物，则攻击最近的物体。它的攻击受到-1环境减值，但会造成额外[[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}。这个效果持续10分钟或直到嘉年华机器人被摧毁。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.XaYM6Td0yhx2POau]{效果: 发生故障}

Cat's Luck.name: Cat's Luck
Cat's Luck.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 Mistress Dusklight fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw

效果 Mistress Dusklight rerolls the saving throw and takes the better result。

Beguile the Addled.name: Beguile the Addled
Beguile the Addled.description: Mistress Dusklight shoots a captivating look at one creature within 60 feet, who must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. Until the end of its next turn, the creature is fascinated by Mistress Dusklight and can't use hostile actions toward her. The victim is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes。

Black Cat Curse.name: Black Cat Curse
Black Cat Curse.description:
频率 once per round

需求 Mistress Dusklight must have fewer than 98 Hit Points

效果 Mistress Dusklight spews a hatefully uttered curse at one creature within 30 feet that she can see. If the target fails a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save, whenever it attempts an attack roll or saving throw, it must roll twice and use the lower result. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. The curse persists until it is removed or the target succeeds a later saving throw against it. The victim can attempt a new @Check[type:will|dc:32] save once per hour to end the curse。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.8z4Q84UlS8cMYVWu]{效果: Black Cat Curse}

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Mistress Dusklight's spellcasting, she attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted。

Mukradi Summoning Runes.name: Mukradi Summoning Runes
Mukradi Summoning Runes.disable: @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:36|name:Approach Rune] to approach without triggering the trap followed by @Check[type:occultism|dc:34|name:Erase the Rune] (expert) or @Check[type:thievery|dc:38|name:Erase the Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to erase the rune, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 34) to counteract the rune。
Mukradi Summoning Runes.hazarddescription: Barely visible runes are etched into the stone floor in a 20-foot diameter circle。
Mukradi Summoning Runes.reset: The trap resets at the first high tide of each day。
Mukradi Summoning Runes.stealthdetails: (master) to notice runes marked on the floor。

Muse Phantom.name: Muse Phantom
Muse Phantom.publicNotes:
For performers who die before their time and whose love of the theater is stronger than death's grasp, the show does indeed go on. Such actors rise from the grave to become muse phantoms-undead spirits that haunt opera houses or auditoriums and possess the bodies of living actors to continue their art。

A host is often utterly unaware of being possessed by a muse phantom. Like egotistical parasites, muse phantoms assume command of their unwitting thespian shells only during big shows with packed audiences, and even then the host might chalk up their sudden lack of control to the transcendence of performance, not the nefarious influence of some paranormal entity. In time, a performer's mind can become utterly warped by the spirit's domination, twisting artistic temperament and vanity into evil selfishness and tireless obsession。

Thespian Aura.name: Thespian Aura
Thespian Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The muse phantom inspires a supernatural emotional response-either comedy or drama. Each creature that begins its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save; on a failure, the creature is affected as long as it remains within the aura. If the muse phantom is emitting a comedic aura, affected creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}; if it is emitting a dramatic aura, affected creatures instead become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}。

The muse phantom can change its aura from comedic to dramatic or vice-versa, or cease or activate this aura, by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait. A creature possessed by a muse phantom is immune to this aura。

Grand Finale.name: Grand Finale
Grand Finale.description:
需求 The muse phantom's thespian aura is active

效果 The muse ceases its thespian aura and deals [[/r {4d8}[mental]]]{4d8心灵伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30], including the creature it is possessing, if any (@Check[type:will|dc:22|basic:true] save). Creatures that fail their Will saves are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the muse phantom for 1 minute。

The muse phantom can't use Grand Finale again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Muse Possession.name: Muse Possession
Muse Possession.description: The phantom muse attempts to possess an adjacent corporeal creature. This has the same effect as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell (@Check[type:will|dc:20|traits:mental,incapacitation,possession]), except the duration is [[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时}, and since the phantom muse doesn't have a physical body, it is unaffected by that restriction of the spell. If the target is at least trained in Performance, the DC of this ability is @Check[type:will|dc:24|traits:mental,incapacitation,possession]。

Muurfeli.name: Muurfeli
Muurfeli.publicNotes:
Before the Black Desert became a barren sandscape, cultures with grand magical traditions lived under its soaring roof. These communities eventually left the vault or died out, but the genies they summoned remained and became warped by the region's pervasive blightburn radiation. Now, these "blightburn genies" have bodies with features mirroring those of beasts that dwell in dark places, and their elemental lineages have been irreparably corrupted。

Whereas typical djinn can cleanse or clear areas with their arcane winds, the air magic of muurfeli is tainted by the Black Desert's noxious radiation and mixed with the realm's ambient fetid winds。

equipment-Key to the Ringmaster's Wagon.name: 团长篷车的钥匙 Key to the Ringmaster's Wagon

Keen Eyes.name: 锐眼 Keen Eyes
Keen Eyes.description: 涅米亚在使用搜索（Seek）动作寻找 30英尺内藏匿或无踪的生物时有+2环境加值。当她以隐蔽或藏匿的对手为目标时，对于隐蔽的目标，她的裸骰检定DC为@Check[type:flat|dc:3]{3}，对于藏匿的目标，则为@Check[type:flat|dc:9]{9}。

Reach Spell.name: 及远法术 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: 如果涅米亚的下一个动作是施放一个有射程的法术，则该法术的射程增加30尺。

Wildwood Halfling.name: 深林半身人 Wildwood Halfling
Wildwood Halfling.description: 涅米亚会忽略树木、树叶和灌木丛中的困难地形。

Nihiris.name: Nihiris
Nihiris.publicNotes:
Banshees are the furious, tormented souls of elves bound to the Material Plane by a betrayal that defined the final hours of their lives. Some banshees arise from elves who were slain by trusted friends and allies, or whose loved ones betrayed them on their deathbeds. Others spawn from elves whose treacherous deeds shortly before their deaths left a stain upon their souls. Regardless of their origin, banshees despise the living. This hatred of life is all too often a horrific inversion of their personalities in life. Some speculate that the more kind-hearted the elf (and the more wrenching the betrayal), the crueler the banshee。

Banshees rarely stray far from where they perished and typically haunt thick forests and canopied swamps where little light graces the ground. Many banshees can be found in the elven nation of Kyonin, specifically in Tanglebriar, the sinister domain of the demon Treerazer. Similarly, a large number of banshees can be found lurking about the edges of drow settlements in the Darklands, as plenty of cruelty and betrayal exists in drow culture。

Banshees' mere touch inflicts pain and primal fear, and those exposed to their wails of grief rarely survive the experience。

Obsidian Golem.name: Obsidian Golem
Obsidian Golem.publicNotes:
The art of golem animation is not limited to societies with access to expensive crafting materials or a long history of arcane mastery. Among the resource-poor xulgaths who dwell in the Darklands, especially those hardy clutches that call the Black Desert their home, obsidian is one of the most common crafting materials available. Combine this ingredient with a powerful spellcaster and the xulgath tradition of inflection-magically warping and working normally inflexible stone-and the end result is an obsidian golem。

Crafted of base materials and then magically animated into a powerful guardian, the legendary golem is a living construct that mindlessly obeys its creator's commands-often continuing to do so for years or even centuries after its creator's death. There exist two known methods of animating a golem. The traditional method involves harvesting and implanting an elemental soul or essence within the newly crafted host statue, a procedure seen as vile and blasphemous to those who value the sanctity of the soul; evil or amoral golem crafters tend to prefer this method. The other, less disreputable technique involves siphoning pure positive energy into the statue to artificially imitate the creation of a soul. The result does not give the golem a true soul and is generally a more costly and time-consuming method of creation. Regardless of the method used, the resulting golem functions the same. A golem's unique animating force leaves it susceptible to certain forms of magic, but apart from these few weaknesses, it is impervious to magic and difficult to damage with weapons。

Golems work best in play as foes to vanquish rather than allies to accompany player characters on adventures. The process of creating a golem is time-consuming, expensive, and difficult, and only the most talented spellcasters or artisans can even hope to accomplish such an undertaking. While certain magical texts-so-called "golem manuals"-are said to aid golems crafters, for the most part the creation of a golem should be something left in the hands of the Game Master。

Golems have components that can be harvested as trophies or magical components; the value depends on the golem in question. Examples of components that can be harvested from golems are listed in the sidebars。

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When Pin rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead。

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 Pin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see。

Pin gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack。

Sprinkle Pixie Dust.name: Sprinkle Pixie Dust
Sprinkle Pixie Dust.description:
Pin sprinkles pixie dust onto one of his arrows. If Pin hits a creature with that arrow before his next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the target's @Check[type:will|dc:26] save. On a critical hit, the target treats its save result as one degree worse。

• Befuddlement (enchantment, mental) On a failed Will save, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure)。

• Charm (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental) The target suffers the result of a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell, except it doesn't gain a bonus to its save if the only hostile act was Pin firing his bow, and Pin can choose to direct the target's adoration to another creature rather than himself。

• Memory Loss (divination, mental) On a failed Will save, the target loses the last 5 minutes of its memory. Pin can add a single false memory if he chooses, which is the only memory the target retains in that time period。

• Reckless Pride (emotion, enchantment, mental) The target suffers the result of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J8pL8yTshga8QOk8]{Delusional Pride}。

Punishing Tail.name: 尾击 Punishing Tail
Punishing Tail.description: 被绘龙的尾巴击中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]豁免。如果失败，它将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，直到下一回合结束；如果大失败，它将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}，直到下一回合结束。

Poisoned Secret Door Trap.name: Poisoned Secret Door Trap
Poisoned Secret Door Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Break the Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to break the mechanism, or @Check[type:perception|dc:39|traits:action:seek] (master) to identify the three stones that, when pressed, prevent the trap from triggering
Poisoned Secret Door Trap.hazarddescription: Multiple tiny needles filled with poison are embedded in this secret door, spring-loaded to pop out。
Poisoned Secret Door Trap.reset: If disabled, the trap resets after 1 minute。

Pruana Two-punch.name: 普鲁阿娜·双拳 Pruana Two-punch
Pruana Two-punch.allSaves: 对抗推撞或摔绊的强韧和反射豁免+2环境加值

o5oVycGSBlCtwNU9.name: 对抗推撞或摔绊的强韧和反射豁免+2环境加值

Haymaker.name: 重拳 Haymaker
Haymaker.description:
普鲁阿娜对她在本回合曾经攻击过的目标进行拳头打击。如果她命中，她会获得+3伤害环境加值，并且该生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]豁免来抵御这一打击的惊人力量。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 目标承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

大失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 5}。

Qormintur.name: Qormintur
Qormintur.publicNotes:
When Qormintur was just 10 years old, her family decided to sell their business in a small duergar settlement and look for new opportunities in the Darklands city of Hagegraf. A few days after departing, duergar slavers attacked their caravan, murdered her father, and captured everyone else. Qormintur was sold as a slave in Shraen, and she never found out where her mother or siblings were taken. She did discover, however, that one of her father's business rivals had blackmailed her parents to leave, and the same duergar had arranged for the slavers to attack the caravan. The memories of that betrayal and the loss of her family still haunt her, and her deepest desire is to get her revenge。

When she arrived in Shraen, Qormintur was first taken to the city's slave pens to be sold as a laborer, personal attendant, or fodder for one of Shraen's undead nobles. Despite the hopelessness, fear, and anxiety she witnessed in the slave pens of Shraen, her spirit never broke. When she was brought to auction, a sadistic vampire named Zihain Shraen attempted to purchase her (and likely make her one of his many playthings). The mummy Dyzallin Shraen outbid the vampire; Qormintur believes that pity or compassion caused Dyzallin to save her from a fate worse than death, but in truth, Dyzallin simply wanted to spite Zihain。

During her first few years as Dyzallin's slave, the ancient drow never failed to remind Qormintur that he had saved her, and that her life was his to take if she ever disobeyed him. At first, Qormintur resented Dyzallin, but as years turned into decades, a strange bond of mutual trust formed between the soulless drow and the young duergar. In a city where trust was a commodity harder to come by than adamantine or diamonds, Dyzallin formed a bond with his servant. Dyzallin kept her close to him and encouraged her personal interests in alchemy. As a reward for her service, Dyzallin has promised to transform her into a mummy. So far, she hasn't considered the offer very seriously; after all, at barely a century old, she's young for a duergar。

Appearances matter in Shraen, so despite Qormintur's trusted position, Dyzallin still makes her display her slave brands on her forearms. As Dyzallin's seneschal, Qormintur takes care of many administrative tasks for him, including buying and selling magic items and other slaves. This position has often put her into contact with the same duergar slavers who once brought ruin to her family. For now, she is forced to hide her feelings, but when the opportunity presents itself, she will not hesitate to exact her revenge. She is more than capable of doing just that-Qormintur is a potent combat alchemist and often leads Dyzallin's forces against urdefhans and other threats. Dyzallin tasked Qormintur with marshalling his forces from Shraen to the lost pyramid of Xul-Khundur, and with securing the site so Dyzallin could study the magic orb at the pyramid in peace. After Dyzallin returned to Shraen with the orb, Qormintur organized guards and has continued her master's research to unearth more of the pyramid's secrets. This research hasn't met with many results so far, and Qormintur is starting to get bored and to wonder whether she's been abandoned. Despite her loyalty to Dyzallin, Qormintur is painfully aware that she doesn't really belong in Shraen, but also that she can never return to her people. Now that she has spent time outside of Shraen and out of Dyzallin's domineering presence, a new thirst for independence is brewing inside her。

Qormintur is a lean, young duergar woman who wears a fine blue cloak over beautifully crafted mithral armor. Her forearms bear sinister-looking brands that match those on her armor and cloak; these brands mark her and her equipment as property of Dyzallin. Her eyes are cold and betray a hint of sadness。

Qurashith.name: Qurashith
Qurashith.publicNotes: Qurashith-or "gluttonwings" in the Common tongue-are fearsome, bat-like predators that haunt the upper reaches of Gluttondark's cavern-worlds. These monstrosities are no mere beasts. A qurashith does not simply devour its victims; once it kills its prey, it physically subsumes the creature into its own body, metabolizing the prey's spiritual essence. Close inspection of a qurashith reveals that its body is an amalgamation of the fiend and its extraplanar and mortal victims, bound together by webs of demonic scar tissue and sticky acidic pus. While the individual personalities of a qurashith's victims gradually metabolize and diffuse into its very substance over time, a particularly charismatic or magically powerful victim might exert some influence over the qurashith's mind for a short time。

Raving Spirit.name: Raving Spirit
Raving Spirit.disable: @Check[type:intimidation|dc:30|name:Quiet the spirit|traits:hazard,haunt,complex] (expert) to quiet the spirit for 1 round, or @Check[type:religion|dc:32|name:Exorcise spirit|traits:hazard,haunt,complex] (master) to exorcise it
Raving Spirit.hazarddescription: The restless spirit of Currew raves against his tormentors when someone enters his room。
Raving Spirit.reset: The haunt grows quiet and resets 1 minute after no creatures are in area B3。
Raving Spirit.routine: (2 actions) The haunts casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} (@Check[type:will|dc:30|name:Phantasmal Killer|traits:hazard,haunt,complex,death,emotion,fear,mental] save and @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|name:Phantasmal Killer|traits:hazard,haunt,complex,death,emotion,fear,mental,incapacitation] save for critical failure) on a random creature who can see Currew's bed (it can even target creatures outside of area B3, so long as the target can see the bed). Everyone affected by the phantasmal killer sees the same image: a sickly old man lies in the bed, screaming and ranting about his guilt, shame, and eventual death。
Raving Spirit.stealthdetails: (expert) or @Check[type:perception|dc:30|traits:action:seek] (master) to detect the spiritual nexus

Raving Diatribe.name: Raving Diatribe
Raving Diatribe.description:
触发 A creature remains in area B3 for longer than 1 round

效果 Each creature in the sealed room is targeted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} (@Check[type:will|dc:30] save). The haunt counts as having met the targets. It then rolls initiative。

Resin Crust.name: Resin Crust
Resin Crust.description: A creature damaged by a resin-seep xulgath's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|traits:damaging-effect] save or be covered with clumps of noxious resin, taking [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8 poison伤害} and a -15-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1分钟). The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} for as long it has a Speed penalty. A creature can spend an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to scrape the resin off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 with each such action。

Resin Spray.name: Resin Spray
Resin Spray.description: The resin-seep xulgath flexes its pores and emits a @Template[type:line|distance:30] of resin that deals [[/r {3d12}[poison]]]{3d12 poison伤害} and knocks the target 5 feet back (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save; on a success or critical success the target isn't knocked back, and on a critical failure the target is knocked back 10 feet). The resin-seep xulgath can't use Resin Spray again for [[/br 1d4]]{1d4轮}。

Xulgath Bile.name: 地蜥人胆液 Xulgath Bile
Xulgath Bile.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

最大持续时间 1小时

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1分钟)。

阶段2 Fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1分钟)。

Dev Note: Xulgath Bile is not included on this creature's original stat block except for the ranged dagger strike. We have included it here to allow GMs to choose to use it. It is a copy from Xulgath Bilebearer and the DC has been increased to match this level.

Elaborate Feint.name: Elaborate Feint
Elaborate Feint.description:
Ruanna attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} using Performance rather than Deception. On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to any melee attack, not just Ruanna's。

Ruanna then Strides。

Runkrunk.name: Runkrunk
Runkrunk.publicNotes:
Traditionally, clay golems are crafted in the image of a deity and used as guardians of tombs or sacred crypts. Clay golems have the power to lay curses upon their victims as punishment for intrusion, leading many to believe that these oft-ancient constructs have a touch of the divine to them. While this idea has little basis in reality, superstitious folk still tread lightly around statues that resemble clay golems even in the slightest。

The animating force within a clay golem is unusually unstable, making the golem prone to entering a berserk frenzy when damaged. Entire treasuries have been totally ruined as a result of a rampaging clay golem, so crafters do well to make sure their golems are maintained and in good working order-or otherwise place them on the other side of the door from the treasures they wish to protect。

Awakened.name: Awakened
Awakened.description: Runkrunk has an Intelligence modifier of -2, a Nature skill of +16, and knows Common and Dwarven (but can't speak any language)。

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: A severely damaged clay golem has a chance of going berserk. If it has 50 or fewer Hit Points at the start of its turn, the golem must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check or go berserk. A berserk golem wildly attacks the nearest living creature, or the nearest object if no creatures are nearby。

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
• Harmed By cold and water ([[/r {5d10}]]{5d10伤害}, [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} from areas or persistent damage)
  • Healed By acid (area [[/r {2d6}[healing]]]{2d6生命值})
  • Slowed By earth

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. These exceptions are listed in shortened form in the golem's stat block, with the full rules appearing here. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem。

  • Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.
  • Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.
  • Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round.
  • Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

Quicken.name: Quicken
Quicken.description:
频率 Once per day。

触发 The clay golem's turn begins. It can't trigger this free action on the first turn of combat。

效果 The clay golem becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute。

Vulnerable to Disintegrate.name: Vulnerable to Disintegrate
Vulnerable to Disintegrate.description: A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} spell affects the golem but deals half the normal amount of damage and causes the golem to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} for 1 round。

Berserk Slam.name: Berserk Slam
Berserk Slam.description:
需求 The golem is berserk。

效果 The clay golem Strikes with its fist at a -1 circumstance penalty. If it hits, it deals an additional [[/r {1d8}[bludgeoning]]]{1d8钝击伤害} and knocks the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Cursed Wound.name: Cursed Wound
Cursed Wound.description: A creature hit by the clay golem's fist must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or be cursed until healed to its maximum HP. The cursed creature can't regain HP except via magic, and anyone @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casting a Spell} to heal the creature must succeed at a DC 29 counteract check or the healing has no effect. The golem's counteract level is equal to its creature level。

Saurian Warmonger.name: Saurian Warmonger
Saurian Warmonger.publicNotes:
These saurians adopt warfare as their primary role and greatest calling. They particularly excel at taking slaves。

Enormous tyrannosaurus-humanoids, saurians are ancient beings who predate the rise of humans and dwell in the world's primeval jungles. While the saurians presented here are evil, saurians of all alignments exist。

Saurian Worldwatcher.name: Saurian Worldwatcher
Saurian Worldwatcher.publicNotes:
The longest-lived saurians favor introspection and take the long view of things-though this thoughtfulness should not be mistaken for weakness. Other saurians defer to worldwatchers' experience。

Enormous tyrannosaurus-humanoids, saurians are ancient beings who predate the rise of humans and dwell in the world's primeval jungles. While the saurians presented here are evil, saurians of all alignments exist。

Shanchek.name: Shanchek
Shanchek.publicNotes: Xulgath thoughtmaws are inheritors of the xulgaths' ancient psychic legacy. They eagerly and liberally use their ability to extract knowledge from their foes to quicken their own prodigious intellects。

Shoony Hierarch.name: Shoony Hierarch
Shoony Hierarch.publicNotes: For all their advancement in agriculture, horticulture, and animal husbandry, shoonies subscribe to a remarkably antiquated form of leadership; the role of hierarch is normally inherited, passed on to the oldest living child of the village's previous hierarch. In the instance that the village's hierarch does not produce an heir, the village holds a general election. Elected hierarchs hold the term for life and are just as highly regarded as hierarchs raised from birth. When the settlement comes under attack, it is up to the hierarch to decide when to fight and when to flee. In most cases, shoonies prefer to elect individuals with a preference toward the latter。

equipment-Signal Arrows.name: Signal Arrows
equipment-Signal Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other。

Blunt Snout.name: Blunt Snout
Blunt Snout.description: The Shoony Hierarch's blunt snout and labyrinthine sinus system make it resistant to phenomena that assail the nose. When it rolls a saving throw against inhaled threats (such as inhaled poisons) and olfactory effects (such as xulgath stench), the outcome is one degree of success better than the result of its roll。

Paddler Shoony.name: Paddler Shoony
Paddler Shoony.description: You hail from shoonies who have lived long and successfully among the reeds and cattails of swamps and marshes, and have adapted to the challenges of living near waterlogged ares. You ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from bogs. When you roll a success to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, you get a critical success instead。

Signal Arrow.name: Signal Arrow
Signal Arrow.description: The shoony hierarch sparks and launches an alchemically treated arrow that creates a bright light high in the sky. A signal arrow cannot be used to deal damage. Hierarchs carry a number of different arrows that signal different things; a red signal arrow might mean retreat, whereas a green arrow might be a call to gather in the village commons。

Shoony Militia Member.name: Shoony Militia Member
Shoony Militia Member.publicNotes: If shoonies had their way, war would cease to exist altogether, but they know this isn't likely. Shoonies' relative wealth of resources and their frailty compared to other humanoids make them a common target of violence and subjugation. Because of this, basic combat training is typically mandatory for all shoony village members. Few individuals pursue lifelong careers in service to their settlement's militia, however. The passing down of a sword from one shoony soldier to another is a time-honored tradition, owing to the rarity of weapons in shoony society。

Blunt Snout.name: Blunt Snout
Blunt Snout.description: The Shoony Militia Member's blunt snout and labyrinthine sinus system make it resistant to phenomena that assail the nose. When it rolls a saving throw against inhaled threats (such as inhaled poisons) and olfactory effects (such as xulgath stench), the outcome is one degree of success better than the result of its roll。

Shoony Tiller.name: Shoony Tiller
Shoony Tiller.publicNotes:
Nearly all shoonies in a given settlement are farmers, fishers, or foragers. Shoonies are not expected to fight to protect their settlements; most agree it is better to live in cowardice than to die with that foolish, intangible principle taller races call "honor." Many shoonies hone their skill with tools rather than arms in the knowledge that whatever is lost to violence can be rebuilt. When cornered, a shoony may put up a fight with whatever they have on hand; the average shoony can wield a simple shovel or pick in melee as well as most humans can wield a sword。

Shoonies are reclusive humanoids who resemble bipedal dogs with wrinkled faces and bulging eyes. They predominantly dwell in the grasslands and hilly plains of the Isle of Kortos. Shoony societies on Kortos are known for their agricultural prowess, industrious work ethic, and skill with tools to shape their environment。

Shoonies have a rich oral history and claim that their kind flourished all around Kortos in the days when the living god Aroden walked among them. Many shoonies believe that Aroden himself personally created the shoonies after he raised the island from the bottom of the sea, and that he had a deep affinity for their people. Whether or not such tales of companionship with the god of humanity are true, shoonies have drastically declined in numbers since Aroden's death over a hundred years ago. Shoony elders point to strange environmental phenomena around their island home as one cause of their diminishment, and others attribute their decline to the rise of warmongering monsters in the area. In a world where might often makes right, it is hardly a surprise that the peaceful but timid shoonies are becoming increasingly rare。

Blunt Snout.name: Blunt Snout
Blunt Snout.description: The Shoony Tiller's blunt snout and labyrinthine sinus system make it resistant to phenomena that assail the nose. When it rolls a saving throw against inhaled threats (such as inhaled poisons) and olfactory effects (such as xulgath stench), the outcome is one degree of success better than the result of its roll。

Dig Quickly.name: Dig Quickly
Dig Quickly.description:
需求 You are standing on dirt, sand, snow, or similar particulate material。

效果 Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole. You dig a shallow pit in the square you currently occupy, turning the square into difficult terrain (including for you). In addition, you also kick up a cloud of grit in a direction of your choice. The cloud extinguishes small, unattended, non-magical fires and helps smother the flames on burning creatures located within the cone; creatures in this cone that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} can immediately attempt an additional @Check[type:flat|dc:15] to end the persistent damage。

Skarja.name: Skarja
Skarja.allSaves: -2 to all saves if Skarja doesn't have her heartstone, 对抗魔法时全豁免+2状态加值

equipment-Skarja's Heartstone.name: Skarja's Heartstone
equipment-Skarja's Heartstone.description:
This pale gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws and the ability to discern a target's alignment (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.QnTtGCAvdWRU4spv]{Detect Alignment}, but can detect chaotic, evil, good, and lawful auras simultaneously) at will by peering through the gemstone。

Like all hag heartstones, this gemstone is powered by Skarja's spirit. Skarja does not need to wear her heartstone to benefit from its powers, but she cannot use them if she hasn't touched her heartstone in the past 7 days. If Skarja's heartstone is separated from her for more than 7 days (or if she's been dead for 7 days), it becomes a non-magical gemstone。

Note: Item is worth 1000 gp when non-magical

Skarja's heartstone allows her to use additional occult innate spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} at will, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} (6th level) twice per day, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} 每天一次。

启动 Acommand

需求 You must be touching the heartstone。

效果 The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract level 7, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+23]])。

制造需求 You must be a night hag。

Coven.name: 巫团 Coven
Coven.description:
Skarja adds @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{Scrying}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8Umt1AzYfFbC4fui]{Spellwrack} to her coven's spells。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

Nightmare Rider.name: Nightmare Rider
Nightmare Rider.description: When Skarja rides a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.waPgKbjhijeZ00Zm]{Nightmare}, the nightmare also gains her status bonus to saves against magic, and both the hag and rider benefit when Skarja uses her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Jp9K5Q9t9ZiDGSaI]{Heartstone's} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} innate spell。

-2 to All Saves (If Hearstone is Lost).name: -2 to All Saves (If Hearstone is Lost)

Abyssal Plague.name: Abyssal Plague
Abyssal Plague.description:
A creature can't recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained} condition until Abyssal plague is cured

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1天)

阶段2 drained increases by 2 (1天)

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description: Skarja can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack or damage bonuses with her Strikes, but might change the damage type her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} deal (typically to bludgeoning)。

Dream Haunting.name: Dream Haunting
Dream Haunting.description:
If Skarja is ethereal and hovering over a sleeping chaotic or evil creature, she can ride the victim's back until dawn. The creature endures tormenting dreams as Skarja casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} on it, and is exposed to Abyssal Plague。

Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained} condition caused by dream haunting is cumulative. Only an ethereal being can confront the night hag and stop her dream haunting。

Spell Ambush.name: Spell Ambush
Spell Ambush.description: A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the night hag takes a -2 circumstance penalty to checks and DCs to defend against her spells。

Smiler.name: 斯迈勒 Smiler
Smiler.publicNotes:
妖鬼——凶残、恶臭、且总是饥肠辘辘——是食尸鬼中更强大的一支。他们在追杀猎物时从不留情。

食尸鬼是一种食肉的不死生物，很少有生物会像他这样普遍存在于野外孤坟或破败墓穴这样的阴暗之地。

Stench.name: 恶臭 Stench
Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

若有生物进入灵光范围或者在回合开始时位于灵光范围内，则必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（若为大失败，则只要处于恶心状态就还会附加@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}）。

身处灵光之内时，生物在对抗疾病以及从恶心状态中恢复的豁免检定中会承受-2环境减值。成功豁免的生物会获得1分钟的临时免疫。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{效果: 妖鬼恶臭}

Consume Flesh.name: 啃食尸体 Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description:
需求 斯迈勒与刚死亡1小时内的生物尸体相邻。

效果 斯迈勒吞食一大块尸体并恢复[[/r {3d6}[healing]]]{3d6生命值}。

斯迈勒从每具尸体上只能获取一次生命值恢复。

Ghast Fever.name: 妖鬼热 Ghast Fever
Ghast Fever.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果 (1天)

阶段2 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且从任何治疗获得的生命值恢复均减半 (1天)

阶段3 如阶段2 (1天)

阶段4 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且无法从治疗获得任何好处 (1天)

阶段5 如阶段4 (1天)

阶段6 死亡，并在下一日的午夜作为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.VC7rtYR4hLxwg7WZ]{妖鬼 Ghast}复生。

Paralysis.name: 麻痹 Paralysis
Paralysis.description: 任意活着的生物在受到斯迈勒的攻击时必须成功通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}。被麻痹的生物可以在自己的每个回合结束时尝试一次新的豁免，每次此豁免的DC都会递减1点。

Swift Leap.name: 迅捷跳跃 Swift Leap
Swift Leap.description: 斯迈勒能跳跃至多自身速度一半的距离。这次移动不会触发反应动作。

Aura of Smoke.name: 烟雾灵光 Aura of Smoke
Aura of Smoke.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

灵光内的每一个生物都处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}；冒烟黑豹可以看穿这种烟雾。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 冒烟黑豹进行一次行走，并在该动作结束时进行一次打击。如果黑豹开始时是藏匿的，它将一直@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}，直到做出这个能力的打击之后。/p>

Scorching Maul.name: 燃烧打击 Scorching Maul
Scorching Maul.description: 冒烟黑豹对它所@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}的生物进行两次爪抓打击。被两次爪抓命中的生物也会受到[[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。这两次攻击会计入多重攻击减值，但只有在两次攻击结束后才会增加。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
冒烟黑豹对措手不及的生物造成额外[[/r {1d4}[precision]]]{1d4精准伤害}。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Spiked Barricade Trap.name: Spiked Barricade Trap
Spiked Barricade Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Supress Spring Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to suppress the spring mechanism for one 5-foot segment of the barricade
Spiked Barricade Trap.hazarddescription: Spring-loaded wedges of sharpened stone pop out of the wooden barricade。
Spiked Barricade Trap.reset: The trap must be manually reset by pushing the wedges back into place。

Stabbing Sentinel.name: Stabbing Sentinel
Stabbing Sentinel.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Remove Animating Magic|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to remove the animating magic without triggering the trap, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 38) to counteract the animating magic
Stabbing Sentinel.hazarddescription: A petrified creature momentarily animates to attack an adjacent creature。
Stabbing Sentinel.reset: The magical energy that animates the statue builds up again over 24 hours and the trap resets。

Suffering Xulgaths.name: Suffering Xulgaths
Suffering Xulgaths.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:42|name:Calm a Spirit|traits:haunt] (master) or @Check[type:occultism|dc:42|name:Calm a Spirit|traits:haunt] (master) to calm each of the four spirits. On a character's first successful check, the character also learns that xulgath funerary rites typically involve cremation, which hints that fire is a viable way to put them to rest。
Suffering Xulgaths.hazarddescription: The shadows of four xulgaths endlessly relive their deaths at the hands of the wendigos and their clutchmates。
Suffering Xulgaths.reset: The haunt is deactivated and resets 1 minute after all non-wendigo creatures leave the area。
Suffering Xulgaths.routine: (4动作) Each active spirit chooses a living non-wendigo creature within 120 feet and attempts to devour it, targeting different creatures if possible. Each calmed spirit reduces the hazard's actions by 1
Suffering Xulgaths.stealthdetails: (expert) to hear the echoed shouts of panicked xulgaths

equipment-A Brush and Pot of Red Paint.name: A Brush and Pot of Red Paint

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 The delinquent is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker she can see。

效果 The delinquent gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack。

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: The delinquent draws a weapon with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action, then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} with the weapon they just drew。

Rattling Blow.name: Rattling Blow
Rattling Blow.description: Creatures the delinquent critically hits are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and can't make reactions until the end of the delinquent's next turn。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The delinquent deals 1d6 damage to flat-footed creatures。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Tallow Ooze.name: Tallow Ooze
Tallow Ooze.publicNotes:
Pale yellow and smelling of meat, this unnatural, globular monster is composed entirely of rendered animal fat. A tallow ooze typically results from magical mishaps during the creation of enchanted candles or soaps, or while rendering the fat of a magical beast, though occasionally spellcasters create these beings intentionally。

A tallow ooze hunts other creatures to subsume them into its own body and absorb their fat. Since tallow is solid at room temperature, tallow oozes must metabolize their own bodies to produce enough heat to remain gelatinous. A tallow ooze that cannot replenish itself with absorbed fat will either consume itself or solidify, though a tallow ooze exposed to too much heat might melt entirely。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
